title: PNC Becomes First Major U.S. Bank to Offer Direct Bitcoin Trading Through Coinbase Integration
body: PNC Bank has entered the digital-asset market in a landmark move that makes it the first major U.S. bank to offer direct Bitcoin trading to its Private Bank clients. The launch is powered by Coinbase‚Äôs Crypto-as-a-Service platform, marking a major step forward in the integration of digital assets into the country‚Äôs traditional banking system. Today marks a major milestone for institutional crypto adoption. @Coinbase ‚Äôs Crypto-as-a-Service platform is now powering @PNCBank ‚Äôs launch of direct bitcoin trading for PNC Private Bank clients ‚Äì the first to market with such an offering among the major U.S. banks. pic.twitter.com/wwuOIRuBfK ‚Äî Coinbase Institutional (@CoinbaseInsto) December 9, 2025 The partnership pairs PNC‚Äôs scale as a top-10 U.S. bank with Coinbase‚Äôs leading crypto infrastructure, creating a seamless experience for clients who want to buy, sell, and hold bitcoin directly within their trusted banking environment. The move arrives at a time when institutional pathways into crypto are expanding at record speed. A First-of-Its-Kind Bitcoin Trading Experience for U.S. Bank Clients With this rollout, PNC Private Bank clients now gain the ability to access direct Bitcoin trading without opening accounts on external exchanges. Everything happens inside PNC‚Äôs existing banking platform, an experience designed to feel familiar, secure, and fully integrated. Clients can buy, sell, and hold bitcoin through the bank‚Äôs interface in the same way they manage their traditional financial assets. Coinbase provides the backend infrastructure, execution, custody architecture, and compliance rails, while PNC delivers the client-facing experience. This approach removes friction, simplifies onboarding, and places bitcoin alongside conventional investment tools. For many high-net-worth clients who prefer to operate within long-trusted financial institutions, this model unlocks digital assets in the most comfortable way possible. Why Coinbase‚Äôs Infrastructure Matters Coinbase‚Äôs Crypto-as-a-Service platform is engineered to integrate directly with large financial institutions. The product allows banks to offer digital-asset services natively, without needing to build trading, custody, or compliance systems from scratch. By partnering with Coinbase, PNC gains access to: ‚Ä¢ Market-grade execution infrastructure ‚Ä¢ Regulated custody systems ‚Ä¢ Compliance and transaction monitoring tools ‚Ä¢ Scalable digital-asset architecture ‚Ä¢ Crypto liquidity with institutional protections Coinbase says this collaboration is part of a broader mission to enable ‚Äúseamless access to digital assets within trusted financial systems,‚Äù reinforcing the idea that crypto is moving from standalone platforms into mainstream finance. Today marks a major milestone for institutional crypto adoption. @Coinbase ‚Äôs Crypto-as-a-Service platform is now powering @PNCBank ‚Äôs launch of direct bitcoin trading for PNC Private Bank clients ‚Äì the first to market with such an offering among the major U.S. banks. pic.twitter.com/wwuOIRuBfK ‚Äî Coinbase Institutional (@CoinbaseInsto) December 9, 2025 For Coinbase, this continues a trend of high-profile institutional partnerships. For PNC, it represents a forward-moving shift toward a new class of financial services that blend traditional banking with emerging asset classes. The Broader Regulatory and Market Context Behind PNC‚Äôs Timing The timing of PNC‚Äôs launch is not accidental. Several developments across U.S. financial markets have accelerated the movement of traditional institutions into digital assets. Earlier this year: ‚Ä¢ The CFTC allowed Bitcoin to be used as derivatives collateral, marking a new level of institutional recognition. ‚Ä¢ Vanguard enabled access to crypto ETFs for over 50 million customers, signaling that even legacy conservative institutions could adopt certain forms of digital-asset exposure. These shifts reflect a broader normalization of crypto in mainstream finance. As regulatory clarity improves and market infrastructure matures, banks are beginning to deliver crypto services directly rather than pushing clients toward external exchanges. PNC‚Äôs decision positions the bank as an early mover at a moment when institutional adoption is not only growing, but accelerating. Why This Integration Sets a New Standard for U.S. Banking PNC is the first major U.S. bank to deploy direct bitcoin trading, but this breakthrough signals a much broader shift in how banks may approach digital assets in the coming years. The partnership introduces a new model: ‚Ä¢ Bitcoin trading happens inside the banking platform, not through third-party accounts. ‚Ä¢ Custody and trading infrastructure are handled by Coinbase, a regulated and publicly traded company. ‚Ä¢ Clients access bitcoin through channels they already trust. ‚Ä¢ Banks keep client relationships, compliance visibility, and data control. This combination, a trusted bank front-end with a regulated crypto infrastructure back-end, creates a template that other U.S. institutions may now look to replicate. For high-net-worth clients, this solves the biggest barriers they face: security concerns, complex onboarding, fragmented platforms, and the lack of integrated wealth-management oversight. For the banking industry, it offers a pathway to meet rising demand without building full crypto systems internally. A Milestone That Signals the Next Phase of U.S. Crypto Adoption PNC‚Äôs launch with Coinbase is more than just a new product offering. It represents a structural shift in how the banking sector views digital assets. Bitcoin is no longer treated as an experimental category held at arm‚Äôs length. Instead, it is being embedded into the same systems that manage deposits, credit, wealth management, and estate planning. The move also reflects changing expectations among affluent clients. Crypto is no longer just for retail traders or niche investment platforms. It is becoming a component of diversified portfolios, long-term planning strategies, and institutional wealth management frameworks. With PNC stepping forward as the first major U.S. bank to offer direct bitcoin trading, the financial industry now enters a new phase, one where digital assets sit inside the traditional banking experience rather than outside it. As Coinbase and PNC frame it, the goal is simple: Enable seamless access to digital assets inside the world‚Äôs most trusted financial systems. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. title: Bitwise 10 Crypto Index ETF Lists on NYSE Arca, Marking Major Expansion for Crypto Indexing
body: The Bitwise 10 Crypto Index ETF (BITW) begins trading today on NYSE Arca, opening a new chapter for crypto index products in the United States. Bitwise confirmed the milestone in an announcement shared on X, calling it a major step forward for investors seeking broad exposure to the digital asset market. Today: The Bitwise 10 Crypto Index ETF ($BITW) begins trading on @NYSE Arca as an exchange-traded product! Thanks to our dedicated investors, BITW is the largest crypto index fund in the world, with $1.25B in AUM (as of today) alongside an eight-year track record. We think this‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/8n8NgEekxO ‚Äî Bitwise (@BitwiseInvest) December 9, 2025 BITW enters the market as the largest crypto index fund in the world, holding $1.25 billion in assets under management as of today. The fund‚Äôs eight-year track record now extends to a fully tradable exchange-listed product, giving investors a way to own a diversified basket of major crypto assets in a single ticker. A New Option for Investors Who Don‚Äôt Want to Pick Winners Crypto continues to grow, but for many investors the challenge remains the same: choosing which assets to back and keeping up with daily market changes. Bitwise argues that BITW solves this problem directly. The fund gives investors exposure to the largest crypto assets by market capitalization, whatever they happen to be at any point in time. Instead of predicting which blockchain ecosystem will dominate, BITW provides a broad index that automatically adjusts to market trends. This makes the product attractive to investors who believe in crypto‚Äôs long-term potential but prefer not to make individual asset bets. The listing offers a simple message: rather than guess the next big winner, an investor can choose BITW and let the index determine the allocation. How BITW Works: A Monthly-Rebalanced Basket of Top 10 Crypto Assets BITW holds a single basket of ten leading crypto assets, ranked by market cap, screened for risk, and rebalanced every month. The structure is flexible, and there is no cap on the largest position. This means allocation follows market reality without artificial limits. If the market consolidates and Bitcoin becomes the only asset with lasting value, BITW would automatically tilt toward almost entirely Bitcoin. If instead the market expands and eight different assets emerge as strong long-term players, the fund adjusts to include them too, even if some of those assets have not yet been created. The core idea is straightforward: BITW adapts as the crypto landscape shifts. Investors don‚Äôt need to forecast which tokens will succeed or collapse; the index handles that filtering. Screened for Liquidity, Security, and Compliance The underlying Bitwise 10 Large Cap Crypto Index is built to navigate the unique risks of digital assets. It uses strict screening rules that incorporate liquidity thresholds, security considerations, and compliance checks. These filters matter. In 2022, during the market turmoil, LUNA reached top-10 status by market cap. But despite its size, it was never admitted into the index because the screening process flagged concerns about the asset‚Äôs fundamentals and stability. BITW investors were therefore shielded from one of the most dramatic asset collapses in crypto history. To keep the process transparent, Bitwise publishes monthly updates showing which assets are entering or exiting the index. This information is released publicly, at the same time, to the entire market, no private access, no preferential treatment. A Product With High Potential and High Risk Bitwise emphasizes that BITW is not an investment company registered under the Investment Company Act of 1940. As a result, it does not offer the same investor protections that govern mutual funds or traditional ETFs. The company outlines this clearly. BITW is not suitable for all investors. It carries significant risk and heightened volatility, and there is always the possibility of losing the entire invested amount. An investment in BITW is not a direct investment in crypto assets themselves. Instead, it tracks the performance of the index it is designed to replicate. Foreside Fund Services, LLC serves as the Marketing Agent for BITW. Bitwise states these disclosures openly to make sure investors understand the structure and risk profile before engaging with the product. Bitwise‚Äôs Long Road to Bringing Crypto Indexing to the U.S. Market Bitwise has been building toward this moment since 2017. Over the years, the firm has positioned itself as a key player in expanding investor access to digital assets. With the launch of BITW on NYSE Arca, the company says it is delivering a product investors have asked for repeatedly: a regulated exchange-traded product that captures the broad crypto market through a single index. The company‚Äôs announcement on X reflects that sentiment directly. Bitwise calls 2025 a breakout year for the space and says it has never been more optimistic about the opportunities ahead. Today: The Bitwise 10 Crypto Index ETF ($BITW) begins trading on @NYSE Arca as an exchange-traded product! Thanks to our dedicated investors, BITW is the largest crypto index fund in the world, with $1.25B in AUM (as of today) alongside an eight-year track record. We think this‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/8n8NgEekxO ‚Äî Bitwise (@BitwiseInvest) December 9, 2025 The listing reinforces Bitwise‚Äôs bet that indexed exposure, not single-asset speculation, will become a core part of the crypto investment landscape. As more investors look for structured ways to participate in digital assets, BITW offers a familiar ETF-style wrapper built around the sector‚Äôs largest names. With the product now trading live on NYSE Arca, Bitwise says it is excited to continue working alongside the investors who helped make the fund the largest crypto index product in the world. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. title: Silk Road Wallets Awaken: The $3.1M Bitcoin Transfer Mystery After a Decade
body: BitcoinWorld Silk Road Wallets Awaken: The $3.1M Bitcoin Transfer Mystery After a Decade In a stunning development that has sent ripples through the cryptocurrency community, dormant Silk Road wallets have suddenly sprung to life after a ten-year silence. According to data from Arkham Intelligence reported by The Block, these wallets transferred approximately $3.14 million in Bitcoin to an anonymous address. This mysterious activity raises critical questions about market impact, ownership, and the long shadow of crypto‚Äôs most infamous marketplace. Let‚Äôs unravel this cryptic event. What Exactly Happened with the Silk Road Wallets? The activity was not a single transaction but a coordinated movement. A cluster of 312 separate Silk Road wallets began transferring their holdings to a single, anonymous Bitcoin address starting with ‚Äúbc1q.‚Äù The total value moved was $3.14 million. Crucially, this is not a complete liquidation. The wallets involved still hold a staggering $41.3 million in Bitcoin , meaning this could be just the beginning of a larger movement. The timing is particularly intriguing. This flurry of transactions occurred shortly after former President Donald Trump commuted the life sentence of Silk Road founder, Ross Ulbricht. While no direct link has been established, the coincidence has fueled intense speculation within crypto circles. The core mystery remains: who controls these wallets now, and what is their intent? Why Should Crypto Investors Care About This Transfer? This event is more than a historical footnote; it has real implications for today‚Äôs market. Large, sudden movements from dormant wallets can influence Bitcoin‚Äôs price through several mechanisms: Market Sentiment: The movement of ‚Äúsleeping‚Äù coins, especially from a notorious source, can create uncertainty and volatility. Sell Pressure: If the transferred $3.1 million in BTC is sent to an exchange and sold, it adds immediate selling pressure to the market. Regulatory Scrutiny: Activity linked to Silk Road inevitably draws the attention of regulators and law enforcement, potentially impacting broader market sentiment. Furthermore, blockchain analysts are now closely watching the destination address. Any subsequent movement to a known exchange address could signal an imminent sell-off. For investors, monitoring these Silk Road wallets provides a unique window into potential market-moving events. What Are the Possible Explanations for This Activity? The purpose behind the transfer is shrouded in mystery. However, several plausible theories have emerged from industry observers: Consolidation by an Owner: A current controller may be gathering funds from many old wallets into one for easier management or future action. Law Enforcement Action: Authorities could have finally gained access and are securing the assets, possibly for eventual auction or seizure. Private Key Discovery: Someone may have rediscovered or cracked the private keys to these dormant addresses after a decade. Each scenario carries different consequences. A private sale could drip coins into the market slowly, while a government auction would likely be a single, large, and public event. The anonymity of the receiving address makes it impossible to know for sure, keeping the crypto community on alert. How Does This Relate to Ross Ulbricht‚Äôs Pardon? The proximity of these transactions to Ross Ulbricht‚Äôs commutation is the elephant in the room. Ulbricht himself has stated he does not control these assets. The funds are widely believed to be held by the U.S. government, which seized them years ago. Therefore, the most logical explanation is that this is an administrative move by a government agency, perhaps preparing for asset disposal or transfer between internal wallets. This theory is bolstered by the methodical, batch-transfer nature of the transactions, which resembles treasury management rather than a private individual‚Äôs action. Regardless of the actor, the awakening of these Silk Road wallets is a powerful reminder of Bitcoin‚Äôs immutable and transparent ledger, where history is never truly forgotten. Conclusion: A Wake-Up Call from Crypto‚Äôs Past The sudden activity from the Silk Road wallets is a captivating narrative that blends crypto history, market mechanics, and ongoing mystery. It demonstrates how dormant blockchain assets can resurface without warning, potentially affecting market dynamics. For investors, the key takeaway is vigilance. Tracking such movements is part of understanding the complex, on-chain ecosystem that drives Bitcoin. This event underscores that in the world of cryptocurrency, the past can‚Äîand does‚Äîsuddenly become very present. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Who owns the Silk Road Bitcoin wallets now? A1: The prevailing belief is that the U.S. government controls most of these seized assets, though the recent transfer‚Äôs executor has not been officially identified. Q2: Could this Bitcoin transfer affect the price of BTC? A2: Yes, potentially. If the moved $3.1 million is sold on an exchange, it creates sell pressure. The news itself can also influence trader sentiment and cause short-term volatility. Q3: What is the connection to Ross Ulbricht‚Äôs pardon? A3: The timing is coincidental but notable. Ulbricht has denied control of the funds. The transfer is likely an unrelated action by the current asset holder, possibly the government. Q4: How can I track these wallets? A4: You can monitor the addresses using blockchain explorers like Arkham Intelligence, Etherscan (for ETH-based trackers), or Mempool.space, which provide real-time transaction data. Q5: Are the remaining $41.3 million in BTC likely to move soon? A5: There is no certainty. The movement of the first $3.1 million suggests the wallets are active, making further transfers a possibility that market watchers are preparing for. Q6: Is it illegal to own Bitcoin from Silk Road? A6: Owning Bitcoin itself is not illegal. However, knowingly receiving or transacting with assets that are proven to be the direct proceeds of crime can have legal consequences, depending on jurisdiction and circumstances. Did this deep dive into the mysterious Silk Road wallet transfers help you? The world of cryptocurrency moves fast, and stories like this shape its landscape. Share this article on X (Twitter) or your favorite social media platform to spark a discussion with fellow crypto enthusiasts! What‚Äôs your theory on where these funds are headed? To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. This post Silk Road Wallets Awaken: The $3.1M Bitcoin Transfer Mystery After a Decade first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Circle Pushes Into Private Stablecoins With USDCx
body: The goal of USDCx is to deliver ‚Äúbanking-level privacy‚Äù while still allowing Circle to provide compliance records when required. The project arrives as a number of major financial firms accelerate their exploration of stablecoins after the US GENIUS Act. Companies like Citigroup, JPMorgan, Bank of America, Western Union and Visa are testing or expanding blockchain-based settlement tools. Circle Unveils Private USDCx Stablecoin issuer Circle is taking a big step toward bringing blockchain payments deeper into the institutional mainstream by developing a new privacy-enhanced version of USDC. The token is known as USDCx, and it is designed specifically for banks and enterprises that want the speed and efficiency of blockchain payments without exposing sensitive financial data on public ledgers. According to a report from Fortune , the new token is being built in collaboration with privacy-focused blockchain developer Aleo. Co-founder Howard Wu said the goal is to offer ‚Äúbanking-level privacy,‚Äù which has long been missing from traditional public blockchains, where wallet addresses and transaction details are openly viewable. The goal of USDCx is to strike a balance between confidentiality and regulatory compliance. While the token‚Äôs on-chain activity will be shielded from public view, Circle will still be able to produce compliance records upon official request from law enforcement or regulators. This hybrid model could solve one of the biggest barriers preventing major financial institutions from using blockchain rails: the fear that exposing internal payment flows could compromise competitive or confidential information. Aleo firmly believes that transparency, which is often called a core blockchain strength, becomes a weakness in real enterprise settings where privacy is not optional. Circle is not the only company working on privacy-preserving digital dollars. Digital asset infrastructure provider Taurus recently introduced a private smart-contract framework that enables stablecoin transfers without revealing counterparties or transaction details. This design is tailored for corporate payrolls and intracompany settlements. The rollout of the US GENIUS Act, the first comprehensive US regulatory framework for dollar-based stablecoins, triggered what some analysts are calling a corporate stablecoin race. Citigroup is now collaborating with Coinbase to test stablecoin-powered payment rails, while JPMorgan and Bank of America are experimenting with their own early blockchain settlement concepts. Western Union is building a digital asset settlement platform on Solana and plans to issue its own US Dollar Payment Token, and Visa expanded its stablecoin integrations to stay competitive in the global payments landscape. USDC and Tether‚Äôs USDT alone make up about 85% of all stablecoin activity , while synthetic dollars and PayPal‚Äôs PYUSD have grown into major players. Circle‚Äôs USDCx now enters this landscape to try and unlock the next wave of adoption.

title: Asia FX Stalls: US Dollar Muted as Fed Caution Meets China‚Äôs Deflation Crisis
body: BitcoinWorld Asia FX Stalls: US Dollar Muted as Fed Caution Meets China‚Äôs Deflation Crisis The forex market is holding its breath. Across Asia, currency traders are navigating a complex web of signals: a hesitant Federal Reserve, persistent China deflation , and a US dollar that has lost its decisive momentum. For investors watching global liquidity and capital flows, this moment of caution in traditional Asia FX markets could signal shifting tides that impact digital asset valuations and cross-border investment strategies. The immediate question is whether this is a pause or a pivot. Why is the US Dollar Muted Despite Global Uncertainty? The US dollar index (DXY), a measure against a basket of major currencies, has been trading in a tight range. This lack of direction stems directly from the Federal Reserve‚Äôs communication. Recent minutes and speeches have emphasized a data-dependent approach, creating what analysts call ‚ÄòFed caution.‚Äô The market is parsing every economic indicator, looking for clues on the timing and pace of potential rate cuts. This uncertainty has removed a key driver of dollar strength‚Äîthe clear expectation of aggressive monetary policy divergence from other central banks. China‚Äôs Deflation Problem: A Drag on Asia FX Sentiment New data confirms a troubling trend for the world‚Äôs second-largest economy. China‚Äôs consumer prices fell for a third consecutive month, while producer prices extended a long-running decline. This persistent China deflation presents a multi-faceted challenge: Domestic Demand: Falling prices encourage consumers and businesses to delay spending, waiting for cheaper goods tomorrow, which further weakens economic activity. Currency Pressure: Deflation typically increases the real value of debt and can lead to calls for more aggressive monetary stimulus, which may weaken the yuan. Regional Spillover: As the economic engine of Asia, China‚Äôs weakness dampens growth prospects and trade flows for its neighbors, weighing on their currencies. The People‚Äôs Bank of China faces a delicate balancing act: providing enough support to combat deflation without triggering excessive capital outflows or currency depreciation. How Are Major Asia FX Pairs Reacting? The reaction across the Asia FX spectrum has been mixed but generally subdued, reflecting the wait-and-see environment. Currency Pair Recent Trend Key Driver USD/CNY (Offshore Yuan) Stable with slight weakening bias PBOC fixing, deflation data USD/JPY (Japanese Yen) Consolidating near multi-decade highs Bank of Japan policy divergence from Fed AUD/USD (Australian Dollar) Range-bound, sensitive to China news Iron ore prices, Chinese import demand USD/INR (Indian Rupee) Resilient, supported by central bank intervention Strong domestic growth, RBI forex reserves This table shows that while the broad forex market theme is caution, local factors and central bank actions are creating important divergences. The Federal Reserve‚Äôs Next Move: What‚Äôs Priced In? The core of the current forex market stalemate is Fed caution . Market-implied probabilities from the CME FedWatch Tool show traders have significantly dialed back expectations for rapid interest rate cuts in 2024. The focus has shifted from ‚Äòwhen‚Äô the Fed will cut to ‚Äòif‚Äô and ‚Äòby how much.‚Äô This repricing has removed a tailwind for risk-sensitive Asian currencies, which often benefit from a weaker dollar and lower US yields. Until the Fed provides clearer guidance‚Äîlikely dependent on upcoming inflation and jobs reports‚Äîthe US dollar may lack a sustained trend, keeping Asia FX pairs in their recent ranges. Actionable Insights for Traders and Investors Navigating this environment requires a nuanced approach. Here are key considerations: Watch the Data: High-impact US data (CPI, NFP) will be critical for breaking the dollar‚Äôs stalemate. In Asia, watch for any shift in Chinese policy response to deflation. Central Bank Rhetoric: Listen for any change in tone from Fed officials. Similarly, statements from the PBOC, Bank of Japan, and Reserve Bank of India will guide their respective currencies. Correlation Awareness: Understand that in a risk-off environment driven by Fed caution or China worries, correlations can break down. Traditional safe-havens may behave differently. Range-Trading Strategies: In the absence of a clear trend, strategies that profit from currency pairs bouncing between established support and resistance levels may be more effective than directional bets. Conclusion: A Market at an Inflection Point The current pause in the forex market is not a sign of calm, but of concentrated tension. Asia FX movements are trapped between the rock of Fed caution and the hard place of China deflation . The muted US dollar reflects this equilibrium. The coming weeks will be decisive. Stronger US data could revive the dollar‚Äôs uptrend, pressuring Asian currencies. Conversely, a decisive shift from the Fed toward easing or a successful policy push from China to reflate its economy could unlock the next leg of weakness for the dollar and strength for regional currencies. For now, patience and selective positioning are the watchwords. To learn more about the latest forex market trends, explore our dedicated section on key developments shaping currency movements and global central bank policies. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is causing deflation in China? China‚Äôs deflation is driven by weak consumer demand following the pandemic, a prolonged crisis in the property sector, and high local government debt, which is limiting fiscal stimulus. The People‚Äôs Bank of China (PBOC) has room to cut rates but is proceeding cautiously. Who is the current Chair of the Federal Reserve? The Chair of the Federal Reserve is Jerome Powell . His public statements and congressional testimonies are closely watched by the forex market for signals on US monetary policy. Which Asian central bank is most likely to intervene in currency markets? The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) and the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) are known for active management of their exchange rates to ensure stability. The Bank of Japan also intervenes occasionally to curb excessive yen weakness. How does China‚Äôs economy affect the Australian Dollar? China is Australia‚Äôs largest trading partner. Weakness in Chinese demand, especially for key Australian exports like iron ore, directly pressures the Australian Dollar (AUD). Therefore, China deflation data is a critical release for AUD traders. This post Asia FX Stalls: US Dollar Muted as Fed Caution Meets China‚Äôs Deflation Crisis first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Asset Manager Strive Launches $500M Stock Sales to Purchase More Bitcoin
body: Vivek Ramaswamy‚Äôs Strive Asset Management has announced a $500 million preferred stock offering, with proceeds earmarked for Bitcoin acquisition. Strive already holds 7,525 BTC, per BitcoinTreasuries data , worth $695.93 million, and stands 14 th among top corporate Bitcoin holders. With the latest stock sales announcement , Strive intends to use the net proceeds ‚Äúfor general corporate purposes,‚Äù including ‚Äúthe acquisition of Bitcoin and Bitcoin-related products and for working capital.‚Äù Further, the asset manager also plans to purchase unspecified ‚Äúincome-generating assets,‚Äù fund acquisitions of businesses and technologies. Strive announces $500,000,000 SATA At-The-Market (ATM) program. The program builds on the success of the upsized SATA IPO offering and will provide the company with additional capital for general corporate purposes, including acquiring more Bitcoin. As of 11/7/25, we HODL‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Strive (@strive) December 9, 2025 Strive‚Äôs Pivot to BTC Treasury Strategy Strive first announced its intention to purchase Bitcoin in May with a merger. It later revealed plans to acquire 75,000 BTC, then valued at over $8 billion, from claims related to the defunct Mt. Gox exchange bankruptcy. Strive‚Äôs recent Bitcoin buying spree reflects Michael Saylor‚Äôs playbook, representing another public company focused on increasing Bitcoin per share. The company has also urged index provider MSCI to rethink its plan to exclude digital asset treasury (DAT) firms from its global indexes. Strive submitted a seven-page letter to the MSCI chairman , arguing that the proposal risks shutting passive investors out of key growth markets. Strive Stocks Up 3.57% ‚Äì Recent Move Triggers Investor Enthusiasm The company‚Äôs stock [NASDAQ: ASST] i s trending up by 3.57% on Tuesday , surging up to $1.12 followed by an apparent Downtrend to $1.02. title: Essential Guide: Binance Launches New USD1 Spot Pairs for BNB, ETH, and SOL
body: BitcoinWorld Essential Guide: Binance Launches New USD1 Spot Pairs for BNB, ETH, and SOL In a significant move for crypto traders, Binance has announced it will list three new spot trading pairs: BNB/USD1, ETH/USD1, and SOL/USD1. This expansion of its Binance USD1 spot pairs offering provides users with more direct trading options against a major stablecoin, set to go live at 8:00 a.m. UTC on December 11. Let‚Äôs explore what this means for the market and your trading strategy. What Are the New Binance USD1 Spot Pairs? Binance is introducing direct trading avenues between three major cryptocurrencies and the USD1 stablecoin. The specific pairs are BNB/USD1, ETH/USD1, and SOL/USD1. This listing allows traders to buy and sell Binance Coin, Ethereum, and Solana directly using USD1, potentially simplifying transactions and improving liquidity for these assets. The launch is scheduled for 8:00 a.m. UTC on December 11. Therefore, traders should mark their calendars and prepare their accounts for this new opportunity. This move highlights Binance‚Äôs ongoing commitment to expanding its market offerings and catering to diverse trader needs. Why Does Listing New Spot Pairs Matter? Adding new Binance USD1 spot pairs is more than just a technical update. It has real implications for market dynamics and user experience. Firstly, it increases accessibility. Traders can now execute trades between these popular coins and a stablecoin without needing to use an intermediate trading pair, which can reduce complexity and transaction costs. Secondly, it enhances liquidity. By providing a direct market, Binance can concentrate trading volume, which typically leads to tighter bid-ask spreads and better price discovery for BNB, ETH, and SOL. This is beneficial for both retail and institutional participants. Simplified Trading: Direct conversion between asset and stablecoin. Potential for Better Pricing: Concentrated liquidity can improve spreads. Strategic Expansion: Signals Binance‚Äôs support for these specific blockchain ecosystems. How Can Traders Prepare for the Launch? With the launch of these Binance USD1 spot pairs approaching, being prepared is key. Ensure your Binance account is verified and funded. You may want to deposit USD1 or the relevant cryptocurrencies (BNB, ETH, SOL) ahead of time to be ready for the market open. Furthermore, consider your trading strategy. New pairs can sometimes experience high volatility in the initial minutes or hours as order books establish. Decide in advance if you are looking to trade immediately for short-term movement or if you are using this as a long-term entry point. Always remember to use risk management tools like stop-loss orders. What Is the Broader Impact on the Crypto Market? Listings on a major exchange like Binance often serve as a bullish signal for an asset. It increases visibility, accessibility, and legitimacy. The introduction of these specific Binance USD1 spot pairs reinforces the standing of BNB, ETH, and SOL as core portfolio assets in the crypto space. Moreover, it underscores the growing importance of stablecoin-based trading pairs. As regulatory landscapes evolve, trading against compliant stablecoins like USD1 may become increasingly standard. This move by Binance could be seen as positioning ahead of that trend, offering users a stable and familiar quote currency. Conclusion: A Strategic Move for Accessibility Binance‚Äôs decision to list the BNB/USD1, ETH/USD1, and SOL/USD1 spot pairs is a strategic enhancement to its platform. It simplifies the trading process for three top cryptocurrencies, potentially improves market efficiency, and aligns with broader industry shifts towards stablecoin liquidity. For traders, it presents new, direct avenues to manage portfolios and react to market movements starting December 11. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What time exactly do the new Binance USD1 spot pairs go live? A1: The BNB/USD1, ETH/USD1, and SOL/USD1 spot trading pairs will be available for trading at 8:00 a.m. UTC on December 11. Q2: Is USD1 a different stablecoin from USDT or USDC? A2: Yes, USD1 is a distinct stablecoin. It is crucial to confirm it is the specific stablecoin supported in your region on Binance before depositing. Q3: Will there be any trading promotions for these new pairs? A3: Binance often runs launch promotions for new listings. Check the official Binance announcements page or blog for any details on trading fee promotions or competitions related to these pairs. Q4: Can I place limit orders before the trading goes live? A4: Typically, limit orders can only be placed once the market is open. The order books for these new pairs will activate at the specified launch time. Q5: How might this affect the price of BNB, ETH, and SOL? A5: While new listings can generate positive sentiment and increased trading activity, leading to potential short-term volatility, the long-term price depends on broader market fundamentals, not just exchange listings. Q6: Are these pairs available to all Binance users globally? A6: Availability can be subject to regional regulations. Users should log into their Binance accounts to see if the pairs are accessible in their jurisdiction. Found this guide to the new Binance USD1 spot pairs helpful? title: Bitcoin-Driven Altcoin Rally Amid Solana Liquidity Reset Points to Early January Rebound
body: Bitcoin-Driven Altcoin Rally Amid Solana Liquidity Reset Points to Early January Rebound

title: Shrinking Liquidity Puts Solana on Unsteady Ground as Profitability Deteriorates: Glassnode
body: The Solana network‚Äôs foundation is weakening as liquidity thins and profitability drops, according to on-chain data. Key Takeaways: Solana is undergoing a ‚Äúfull liquidity reset,‚Äù with realized losses exceeding profits and liquidity falling. Exchange outflows and steady ETF inflows are providing structural support despite thinning liquidity. Analysts see potential recovery by early January, but near-term volatility remains high. According to Glassnode , Solana‚Äôs 30-day average realized profit-to-loss ratio has remained below 1 since mid-November, a level typically associated with bear-market behavior. A reading under 1 means traders are realizing losses more often than profits, signalling deteriorating sentiment and reduced liquidity. Analysts Say Solana Entering ‚ÄúFull Liquidity Reset‚Äù On-chain research group Altcoin Vector described the current environment as a ‚Äúfull liquidity reset,‚Äù a pattern that has historically marked the beginning of new liquidity cycles and preceded market bottoms. If the structure mirrors April‚Äôs setup, analysts said liquidity could begin to recover in roughly four weeks, pointing to early January for potential renewed momentum. A key lesson in alt positioning: when liquidity ignites, the move is fast. $SOL is under a full liquidity reset, setting a new liquidity cycle, as in past bottoming phases. Forced selling exhausts, the ecosystem cleans from the inside out, and SOL begins building the base for‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/tiLw6gwhdb ‚Äî Altcoin Vector (@altcoinvector) December 5, 2025 Despite the pressure, Solana isn‚Äôt without support. Persistent withdrawals from centralized exchanges have steadily reduced available supply, while demand from ETF buyers continues to build. Spot Solana ETFs recorded $17.72 million in net inflows so far this week, nearly matching last week‚Äôs $20.30 million, according to SoSoValue. Still, the broader environment remains fragile. Elevated leverage across crypto markets has amplified volatility, with CoinGlass reporting $432 million in liquidations over the past 24 hours. Solana accounted for $15.6 million of that, making it the third-most liquidated asset behind Bitcoin and Ethereum, as the token climbed 3.2% on the day, per CoinGecko. Analysts say the mid- to long-term outlook for Solana remains slightly constructive, especially if macro uncertainty clears and liquidity returns to the market. However, in the near term, shrinking profitability, thinning liquidity, and heavy leverage leave the asset vulnerable to sharp swings. As reported, Pye Finance has revealed a $5 million seed round led by some of the major players in the space. The goal is to turn billions in locked SOL stakes into an active yield market. Variant and Coinbase Ventures led this round, with participation from Solana Labs, Nascent, Gemini, and others, according to the press release. Pye says that it‚Äôs building bond markets for validators and stakers on Solana (SOL) . The platform enables validators to draw and keep stake. They can offer rewards across more than a thousand validators. Fed Liquidity Boost Could Send Bitcoin ‚ÄúSharply Higher‚Äù As reported, Bitcoin‚Äôs climb above $92,000 has stirred fresh optimism among market watchers who now believe this week‚Äôs Federal Reserve meeting could set off a far bigger rally. Analysts at the London Crypto Club say a liquidity boost from the Fed on Wednesday may act as a powerful catalyst, potentially driving the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency ‚Äúsharply higher.‚Äù In their latest note, David Brickell and Chris Mills argue that the central bank is poised to deliver a ‚Äúdovish surprise,‚Äù forecasting that policymakers will inject liquidity through a creative bond-buying mechanism rather than explicit quantitative easing. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre moving into a continued rate-cutting cycle accompanied by balance sheet expansion as the Fed effectively turns on the money printers to monetise the deficit,‚Äù they wrote. Meanwhile, a key on-chain indicator known as ‚Äúliveliness‚Äù is climbing again , even as Bitcoin‚Äôs price action remains subdued. Analysts say the divergence suggests renewed underlying demand, with dormant coins moving at levels not seen in years, a sign that long-term holders may be re-entering the market. Last week, Bitfinex said the market is showing ‚Äúseller exhaustion‚Äù following a period of heavy deleveraging and panic-driven exits by short-term holders. The post Shrinking Liquidity Puts Solana on Unsteady Ground as Profitability Deteriorates: Glassnode appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Historic Reversal: Ethereum ETF Flows Plunge To Worst Month Since Launch
body: Ethereum‚Äôs momentum in institutional markets just hit a major roadblock. After months of enthusiasm surrounding spot Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs), new data has shown that ETF flows have sunk to their worst monthly total since their launch. The sharp drop reflects a broader cooldown in investor demand, as market volatility and shifting risk appetite weigh on crypto allocations. Will Staking ETFs Emerge To Stabilize Flows? In an X post, a crypto analyst known as Milk Road revealed that the Ethereum ETFs had just printed their worst month on record since launch, which is roughly $1.4 billion in net outflows, the largest single-month withdrawal that ETH has ever encountered. Related Reading: Ethereum Shows Signs Of Accumulation As CVD Strengthens And Correlation Stays Elevated Historically, ETF flow reversals tell more about liquidity pressure in the broader financial system than the long-term fundamentals of the asset itself. When redemptions spike this hard, it‚Äôs usually a sign that broader risk sentiment is cracking, not that the asset itself broke. Meanwhile, most investors don‚Äôt know that while ETFs were handing back, Digital Asset Treasuries (DATs) stepped in as aggressive buyers. BitMine Immersion Technologies (BMNR) quietly added over 300,000 ETH, worth nearly $800 million at the time, to its treasuries. If the ETF outflow continues to accelerate, the near-term price action will remain choppy as liquidity gets strained at the edges. However, if DAT inflows continue scaling, it builds the foundation for a tighter supply setup into 2026. The tension between this panicked short-term selling pressure and the quiet structural long-term accumulation is the most important dynamic for positioning. Why ETH Reserves Are Becoming Strategic Corporate Assets Crypto trader Bull Theory has noted that last week, BitMine bought an astonishing 138,452 ETH, worth $437.7 million. This single transaction solidifies their position as the largest ETH treasury in the world, holding 3.86 million ETH, valued at $12.4 billion and accounting for 3.2% of the entire circulating supply. Related Reading: Here‚Äôs Why Ethereum Emerges As The Global Capital Rails For On-Chain Finance The true source of rising ETH demand is that Wall Street is quietly building on ETH. BlackRock, with $13.5 trillion AUM, has launched tokenized funds on ETH and has filed for a staked ETH ETF. JPMorgan, with $4 trillion, Deutsche Bank, with $1.1 trillion, and Standard Chartered, with $800 billion, are developing tokenization and DeFi infrastructure using ETH and its Layer-2 networks. Institutions like Amundi, HSBC, BNY Mellon, Coinbase, Kraken, and Robinhood are all using ETH rails for custody and settlement or rollup infrastructure for scaling and security. Furthermore, large companies are now holding and staking ETH for yield. BitMine alone expects to generate $400 million+ a year in staking revenue from its position. Tom Lee believes that as staking demand grows and institutions scale tokenization increases, ETH could reach $12,000 in 2026. ‚ÄúA Bitcoin miner is now the largest Ethereum whale, Wall Street is building on ETH, and treasuries are shifting toward yield. ETH is quickly becoming part of the Global Financial System.‚Äù Bull Theory noted. Featured image from Freepik, chart from Tradingview.com

title: Why 2026 Is Unlikely To Be Crypto‚Äôs Next Bust Year: Bitwise CIO
body: Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan says the crypto market is anchored to the wrong mental model. Speaking on the Empire podcast recorded 5 December and released on 8 December, he argued that the traditional ‚Äúfour-year Bitcoin cycle‚Äù has lost its explanatory power ‚Äì and that 2026, which many expect to be a brutal post-halving down year, is far more likely to be an ‚Äúup year‚Äù driven by institutional flows and regulatory tailwinds. ‚Äú2026 will not be a bad year, Jason,‚Äù Hougan told host Jason Yanowitz. ‚ÄúI think 2026 will be a good year I just don‚Äôt understand the logical reason why [the four-year cycle] would repeat again. It‚Äôs not like built into a mechanical clock. It was driven by specific factors and those factors no longer exist, so it won‚Äôt keep happening.‚Äù He acknowledged that recent price action has unnerved investors, with Bitcoin giving back a ‚Äú Vanguard pump‚Äù and selling off into a weekend on no obvious news. But he framed that as positioning and microstructure, not the start of a structural unwind. ‚ÄúPeople in crypto over the last two months have learned to be nervous on weekends,‚Äù he said, pointing to thin weekend liquidity and Friday macro headlines. He noted that sentiment is depressed even though ‚Äúthe market is flat for the year,‚Äù adding: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre freaking out about a market that is flat for the year.‚Äù Why The 4-Year Crypto Cycle Is Dead Hougan broke down the four main explanations traditionally used to justify the Bitcoin cycle and argued each is now materially weaker. First is the halving itself. ‚ÄúThe halving cycle is just not that important,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs half as important as it was four years ago [‚Ä¶] a fraction of, you know, a quarter as important as it was eight years ago, a sixteenth, etc. There‚Äôs just not that much supply being removed.‚Äù As issuance becomes a smaller fraction of total supply and ETF and derivatives flows grow, the mechanical supply shock carries less weight. Second is the rate cycle. Prior ‚Äúdown years‚Äù such as 2018 and 2022 coincided with aggressive rate hikes. ‚ÄúInterest rates are going down,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúSo that thesis is just completely invalidated, right? It‚Äôs completely different.‚Äù Third is the ‚Äúblow-up‚Äù pattern ‚Äì Mt. Gox , ICOs, FTX ‚Äì that historically capped euphoric phases. Hougan allowed that balance-sheet stress in parts of the market is ‚Äúthe strongest case for the four-year cycle repeating,‚Äù but he does not expect forced liquidations on the scale of prior collapses. In his view, potential problem entities are more likely to ‚Äújust not buy as much in the future‚Äù rather than being compelled sellers. Fourth is simple randomness: three similar cycles do not make a law of nature. ‚ÄúAcross those four, they‚Äôre all much weaker than they were in the past,‚Äù he summarised. Why 2026 Is Poised To Be Better Than 2025 Against that, Hougan set what he sees as a once-in-a-generation shift in regulation and institutional behaviour. ‚ÄúYou have a once-in-a-generation regulatory change from severe regulatory headwinds to strong regulatory tailwinds,‚Äù he said, and ‚Äúmore importantly, you have this institutional adoption narrative that‚Äôs going to overwhelm everything.‚Äù In the last six months, he noted, major US wirehouses have ‚Äúgreen-lit crypto exposure.‚Äù He singled out Bank of America : ‚ÄúThey have $3.5 trillion in assets. One percent is $35 billion. Four percent is like $140 billion. That‚Äôs more than the total flows into Bitcoin ETFs so far.‚Äù He stressed it is not just one bank: ‚ÄúThere are four wirehouses. They‚Äôre basically all on now [‚Ä¶] the biggest advisory groups all managing many trillions of dollars.‚Äù The catch is timing. Institutional allocations are slow and process-driven. ‚ÄúThe average Bitwise client, I think, invests after eight meetings with us,‚Äù he said, and some of those are quarterly. That ‚Äúeight-meeting‚Äù lag means the ETF era is still in its early innings; the full impact of platforms being switched on is more likely to manifest through 2026 than in a single explosive quarter. Hougan also emphasised that advisers optimise for client retention, not absolute performance. ‚ÄúThe one thing a financial adviser doesn‚Äôt want to do is have a meeting with their client where something is down 50% and their client fires them,‚Äù he said. That is why reduced volatility, cleaner regulation and mainstream narratives like ‚ÄúBitcoin as digital gold ‚Äù and ‚Äústablecoins and tokenization as new financial rails‚Äù matter so much. On supply dynamics, he pushed back on two recurring fears: ‚Äú OG whales dumping ‚Äù and MicroStrategy as a forced seller. He argued that much of the apparent ‚Äúselling‚Äù by long-term holders is actually upside being sold via covered calls. Whales come to Bitwise and similar firms, he said, saying: ‚ÄúI have a hundred million of Bitcoin [‚Ä¶] can you write covered calls against this?‚Äù That ‚Äúeffectively introduces new supply into the market‚Äù without coins moving on-chain. On MicroStrategy, he was categorical: ‚ÄúFrom a data perspective [it is] just strictly untrue that it will be forced to sell its Bitcoin.‚Äù The company has meaningful cash to service interest, no principal due until 2027, and manageable maturities relative to its Bitcoin holdings. He agreed with Jeff Dorman‚Äôs framing that MicroStrategy is no longer a major marginal buyer but also ‚Äúnot a forced seller.‚Äù Too much pessimism on the timeline. Brought on @Matt_Hougan to tell us why 2026 will be FAR better than 2025. Tons of good nuggets in here related to institutions, financial advisors, cycles, and more. Enjoy the optimism! pic.twitter.com/WZJb55yENF ‚Äî Yano (@JasonYanowitz) December 8, 2025 Looking ahead, Hougan expects investors to eventually reframe the current period not as a failed bull cycle but as a behavioural transition through a key level. ‚ÄúWe might look back at 2025 at some point and say, ‚ÄòHuh, you know what? $100,000 was like a big behavioral cliff we had to get over. Took us like a year,‚Äô‚Äù he said. For 2026 specifically, his message is clear: the old four-year pattern ‚Äúwon‚Äôt keep happening,‚Äù and the combination of regulatory clarity and institutional inflows sets up what he calls an ‚Äúextraordinarily strong‚Äù backdrop rather than a programmed bust. At press time, the total crypto market cap stood at $3.06 trillion. Featured image from YouTube, chart from TradingView.com
tags: Crypto News|Bitwise|crypto|Crypto market news|crypto news|Crypto Prediction 2026|Matt Hougan

title: Urgent CBDC Ban: US Lawmaker Moves to Block Federal Reserve Digital Currency
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent CBDC Ban: US Lawmaker Moves to Block Federal Reserve Digital Currency In a bold political maneuver, a US lawmaker has launched a direct challenge to the future of digital money in America. Representative Keith Self has submitted a critical amendment aiming for a complete CBDC ban , embedding this financial fight within the must-pass National Defense Authorization Act. This move signals a deepening political battle over who controls the future of US currency. What Does This Proposed CBDC Ban Actually Do? The amendment, if passed, would create a legal firewall. It explicitly prohibits the Federal Reserve from developing, testing, or launching a central bank digital currency for direct use by individuals. This isn‚Äôt just a policy suggestion; it‚Äôs an attempt to write a permanent CBDC ban into law through the powerful NDAA, which funds the entire US military. The strategy is clear: attach the controversial digital currency prohibition to a bill that Congress must pass. Therefore, lawmakers would have to vote on the defense budget and the CBDC ban as a single package, increasing its chances of success. Why Is There Such Strong Opposition to a US Digital Dollar? Proponents of the ban cite major concerns that resonate with privacy advocates and financial freedom supporters. Their core arguments include: Financial Surveillance: A digital currency could allow unprecedented government tracking of every transaction. Programmability Risks: The government could theoretically impose restrictions on how and when money is spent. Centralization of Power: It places immense monetary control directly in the hands of a central bank. Privacy Erosion: Moving away from physical cash eliminates anonymous transactions. However, supporters of a US CBDC argue it could modernize payments, increase financial inclusion for the unbanked, and help the dollar compete with digital currencies from China and other nations. The debate, therefore, pits innovation and global competitiveness against core American values of privacy and liberty. What Are the Immediate Next Steps for This CBDC Ban Proposal? The amendment‚Äôs journey is just beginning. First, it must pass the House Rules Committee, which decides what amendments get a floor vote. This is a crucial hurdle. If it clears the committee, it proceeds to a full vote in the House of Representatives. Its inclusion in the NDAA is particularly significant. Initially, House Republican leadership released a version of the defense bill without any CBDC ban language. Representative Self‚Äôs amendment forces the issue back onto the agenda, demonstrating persistent and organized opposition within Congress to a digital dollar. Could This CBDC Ban Actually Become Law? The path to becoming law is complex but possible. The amendment must survive the House, then be reconciled with the Senate‚Äôs version of the NDAA, which may not contain a similar provision. The final, decisive battle would happen in a conference committee where lawmakers from both chambers negotiate the final bill. Even if the CBDC ban fails this year, its introduction sets a powerful precedent. It mobilizes opposition, frames the public debate, and establishes a legislative blueprint for future attempts to block a Federal Reserve digital currency. The fight over a US CBDC is now officially a congressional battle. The Bottom Line: A Defining Moment for Digital Currency This proposed CBDC ban represents more than a single amendment; it is a watershed moment. It crystallizes the deep philosophical divide over the future of money. On one side is the push for technological efficiency and state-controlled financial systems. On the other is a defense of financial privacy and decentralized economic freedom. The outcome of this political clash will shape the US monetary system for decades, determining whether the digital future of the dollar is centralized or remains in the hands of its users. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is the NDAA and why does it matter for a CBDC ban? The National Defense Authorization Act is the annual bill that authorizes funding for the US Department of Defense. It is considered a ‚Äòmust-pass‚Äô piece of legislation. Attaching the CBDC ban to it is a strategic move to force a vote on the issue and increase its chances of becoming law. Who is Representative Keith Self? Keith Self is a Republican Congressman representing Texas‚Äôs 3rd congressional district. He is a member of the House Financial Services Committee and has been a vocal critic of a US central bank digital currency, framing it as an issue of government overreach and financial privacy. Has the Federal Reserve already created a CBDC? No. The Federal Reserve has only been researching the potential for a digital dollar. It has repeatedly stated that it would not proceed without clear support from the executive branch and authorizing legislation from Congress. This amendment seeks to preemptively deny that authorization. Do other countries have CBDCs? Yes. Several countries, including China with its digital yuan, have already launched or are in advanced testing phases of their own central bank digital currencies. This global shift is a key reason the US is debating the issue, with some arguing America risks falling behind. What happens if this amendment passes the House but not the Senate? If only one chamber of Congress approves the ban, it will not become law. The final NDAA bill is negotiated between the House and Senate. The CBDC ban provision would be a key point of negotiation, and could be removed, modified, or kept in the final compromise bill sent to the President. Can the President veto a CBDC ban? Yes, the President can veto any bill passed by Congress, including the NDAA. However, overriding a presidential veto requires a two-thirds majority in both the House and Senate, which is a very high bar. The political dynamics surrounding a potential veto would depend on the administration in power at the time. Did this analysis of the potential CBDC ban help you understand the high-stakes political battle? Share this article to spark a conversation about the future of money and financial privacy on your social media channels. Your voice matters in this critical debate. To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency regulatory trends, explore our article on key developments shaping global digital currency policy and institutional adoption. This post Urgent CBDC Ban: US Lawmaker Moves to Block Federal Reserve Digital Currency first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Ethereum Price Climbs Toward $3,300 For The First Time Since November: What‚Äôs Driving The Surge?
body: On Tuesday, the Ethereum price experienced a notable surge, climbing by 6.5% and reclaiming the critical $3,300 mark for the first time in nearly a month. This has allowed Ethereum to outpace its peers among the top ten cryptocurrencies by market capitalization, showcasing a nearly 12% recovery for the leading altcoin over the past week. ETH Grows In Demand Analysts from Bull Theory attribute this resurgence to several key factors, including significant institutional interest in Ethereum. The firm highlighted BitMine, which holds the largest public company collection of ETH, as a major player in this recovery phase. In a recent social media update on X (formerly Twitter), the analysts pointed out that demand for ETH is on the rise as Wall Street quietly builds on the Ethereum platform. Related Reading: Crypto Market Structure Talks: Senator Lummis Addresses Latest Legislation Plans Notably, major financial institutions are beginning to make substantial moves in the Ethereum space. BlackRock, which manages $13.5 trillion, is launching tokenized funds and has filed for a staked Ethereum exchange-traded fund (ETF). Other notable players include JPMorgan with $4 trillion in assets, Deutsche Bank at $1.1 trillion, and Standard Chartered with $800 billion. These firms are developing tokenization and decentralized finance (DeFi) infrastructure specifically on Ethereum and its Layer 2 (L2) solutions. In addition, well-known financial entities such as Amundi, HSBC, BNY Mellon, Coinbase (COIN), Kraken, and Robinhood (HOOD) are incorporating Ethereum into their operations for functions like custody, settlement, and rollup infrastructure. As a result, these large companies are holding and staking ETH to generate yield, significantly increasing the altcoin‚Äôs demand. BitMine, for instance, anticipates earning over $400 million annually from its staking position. Could The Ethereum Price Hit $12,000? Such institutional involvement has led market experts like Tom Lee to speculate that the Ethereum price could potentially reach $12,000 by 2026, driven by growing staking demand and the scaling of tokenization efforts. Adding to the momentum, Arkham reported that Tom Lee‚Äôs Ethereum treasury firm acquired 138,452 ETH since last week, valued at approximately $431.97 million. BitMine currently holds $12.05 billion in ETH and has an additional $1 billion allocated for further purchases. Related Reading: Wall Street Giant Bernstein Predicts Bitcoin Price To Hit $1 Million By 2033 In a different development that could bolster the Ethereum price further, Chris MacDonald, an analyst for The Motley Fool, highlighted reports indicating that the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) confirmed US banks can now legally conduct ‚Äúriskless principal‚Äù transactions in crypto assets. The analyst asserted that this new regulatory approval may lead to an influx of capital into digital assets, which would likely benefit the Ethereum price and holders, as well as other top cryptocurrencies. As of this writing, the Ethereum price is trading at $3,325. Despite recent gains, the price is still nearly 33% below the all-time high of $4,946, which was reached earlier this year. Featured image from DALL-E, chart from TradingView.com

title: TON price prediction 2025-2031: Will TON reach $10?
body: Key takeaways: Our TON price prediction anticipates a high of $6.35 in 2025. In 2027, it will range between $9.26 and $11.49, with an average price of $9.60. In 2030, it will range between $28.31 and $34.81, with an average price of $29.16. TON (The Open Network) is a decentralized protocol designed by Telegram and created by the community. The protocol is a distributed supercomputer, or ‚Äúsuper server,‚Äù that consists of TON Blockchain , TON DNS, TON Storage, and TON Sites. The native token for the TON ecosystem is called Toncoin. ‚ÄúWill TON ever go up? Can TON reach the $10 mark? Where will TON be in five years?‚Äù These are the questions traders and investors ask. Let‚Äôs answer them and more in our Toncoin price prediction. Overview Cryptocurrency Toncoin Ticker TON Current price $1.64 Market cap $4.02B Trading volume $91.49 Circulating supply 2.44B All-time high $8.24 on Jun 15, 2024 All-time low $0.3906 on Sep 20, 2021 24-hour high $1.69 24-hour low $1.61 TON price prediction: Technical analysis Metric Value Volatility (30-day variation) 11.00% 50-day SMA $1.88 200-day SMA $2.85 Sentiment Bearish Green days 15/30 (50%) Fear and Greed Index 22 (Extreme Fear) TON price analysis: TON‚Äôs drop slows On December 10, TON‚Äôs price rose by 1.94% in 24 hours but fell by 22.32%% in the last 30 days, as it traded in a bear market. Its trading volume fell by 12.50% to $91.53M showing less trader interest. TON/USD 1-day chart price analysis TONUSD chart by TradingView Toncoin dropped this month after failing to break resistance at the 23.60% Fibonacci level ($1.87). The drop and its volatility decelerated this week, as shown by the William Alligator trendlines. The relative strength index (40.34) shows TON is oversold. TON/USD 4-hour chart price analysis TONUSD chart by TradingView The 4-hour chart highlights TON‚Äôs run this month, showing a gradual ascent, broken by steep reversals. The latest candle formation, three black crows, suggests bearish continuation. The MACD histograms (0.001) show little market momentum as trading volumes dropped. Toncoin technical indicators: Levels and action Daily simple moving average (SMA) Period Value ($) Action SMA 3 2.10 SELL SMA 5 1.89 SELL SMA 10 1.76 SELL SMA 21 1.67 SELL SMA 50 1.88 SELL SMA 100 2.33 SELL SMA 200 2.85 SELL Daily exponential moving average (EMA) Period Value ($) Action EMA 3 1.70 SELL EMA 5 1.87 SELL EMA 10 2.20 SELL EMA 21 2.59 SELL EMA 50 2.92 SELL EMA 100 3.06 SELL EMA 200 3.36 SELL What to expect from the TON price analysis next? title: Binance Coin Price Prediction: Will BNB Reach $1000 by 2030?
body: BitcoinWorld Binance Coin Price Prediction: Will BNB Reach $1000 by 2030? As the cryptocurrency market continues to evolve, Binance Coin (BNB) stands as one of the most watched assets in the digital economy. Investors and traders are constantly asking: will BNB hit the coveted $1000 mark? This comprehensive analysis examines the factors that could drive Binance Coin price prediction models from 2025 through 2030, providing insights into potential growth trajectories and market dynamics. Understanding Binance Coin‚Äôs Current Market Position Binance Coin operates as the native token of the Binance ecosystem, the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume. Unlike many cryptocurrencies, BNB serves multiple functions including transaction fee discounts, participation in token sales, and powering the Binance Smart Chain. This utility foundation provides BNB with intrinsic value beyond speculative trading. The BNB price forecast must consider both its utility within the Binance ecosystem and its position in the broader cryptocurrency market analysis. Key Factors Influencing BNB Price Forecast Several critical elements will determine whether BNB can reach $1000 by 2030. First, the continued growth of the Binance exchange directly impacts BNB demand. As more users join the platform, the utility of BNB as an exchange token increases. Second, regulatory developments surrounding cryptocurrency exchanges globally could significantly affect Binance‚Äôs operations and, consequently, BNB‚Äôs value. Third, the expansion of the Binance Smart Chain ecosystem creates additional use cases for BNB beyond simple exchange utility. Other important considerations include: Market adoption of decentralized applications on Binance Smart Chain Competition from other exchange tokens and layer-1 blockchain platforms Overall cryptocurrency market cycles and investor sentiment Token burn mechanisms that reduce BNB supply over time Binance Coin Price Prediction: 2025 Outlook Looking toward 2025, most analysts project moderate growth for BNB assuming continued expansion of the Binance ecosystem. The BNB future value depends heavily on whether the cryptocurrency market enters another bull cycle. If historical patterns repeat, 2025 could see increased institutional adoption of cryptocurrencies, potentially benefiting established tokens like BNB. However, increased regulatory scrutiny of centralized exchanges presents a significant challenge that could impact this cryptocurrency market analysis. Scenario 2025 Price Range Probability Bullish $800 ‚Äì $950 30% Moderate $550 ‚Äì $750 50% Bearish $350 ‚Äì $500 20% BNB Price Forecast: 2026-2028 Projections The mid-term outlook for BNB depends on several technological and market developments. As an exchange token, BNB‚Äôs value proposition extends beyond simple price appreciation. The continued development of the Binance Smart Chain could position BNB as more than just a utility token for fee discounts. If decentralized finance and other applications gain mainstream adoption on the chain, demand for BNB could increase substantially, positively impacting the BNB price forecast. Will BNB Hit $1000? The 2030 Milestone Analysis Reaching $1000 represents approximately a 2.5x increase from current levels, assuming no major market disruptions. This Binance Coin price prediction considers both optimistic and conservative scenarios. On the optimistic side, continued growth of the Binance ecosystem, successful expansion into new markets, and increased utility through additional use cases could drive BNB to surpass $1000 well before 2030. However, this cryptocurrency market analysis must also account for potential challenges including regulatory hurdles, increased competition, and market volatility. Key milestones that could signal BNB‚Äôs path to $1000: Sustained growth in Binance exchange user base exceeding 200 million Expansion of Binance Smart Chain to host over 1,000 active dApps Successful navigation of regulatory challenges in major markets Continued token burns reducing circulating supply by 20%+ from current levels Comparative Analysis: BNB Versus Other Exchange Tokens When evaluating BNB future value, it‚Äôs essential to consider its position relative to other exchange tokens. BNB currently leads this category by market capitalization, but competitors are emerging. The success of BNB as an exchange token depends on maintaining Binance‚Äôs dominant market position while expanding utility beyond simple fee discounts. This comparative analysis suggests that BNB‚Äôs integrated ecosystem approach provides advantages over simpler exchange tokens. Risks and Challenges in BNB Price Prediction No cryptocurrency market analysis is complete without considering potential risks. For BNB, regulatory uncertainty represents the most significant challenge. As governments worldwide develop cryptocurrency regulations, centralized exchanges like Binance face increased scrutiny. Additionally, technological risks including security vulnerabilities, competition from other blockchain platforms, and market sentiment shifts could impact the BNB price forecast. Investors should consider these factors when evaluating long-term Binance Coin price prediction models. Actionable Insights for BNB Investors Based on this comprehensive analysis, investors considering BNB should focus on several key areas. First, monitor regulatory developments affecting centralized exchanges globally. Second, track adoption metrics for the Binance Smart Chain ecosystem. Third, pay attention to token burn rates and supply dynamics. Fourth, consider dollar-cost averaging rather than timing the market. Finally, maintain a diversified cryptocurrency portfolio rather than concentrating heavily in any single asset, including BNB. Frequently Asked Questions What is Binance Coin (BNB)? Binance Coin is the native cryptocurrency of the Binance exchange ecosystem, created by Changpeng Zhao (CZ). It serves multiple functions including transaction fee discounts, participation in token sales, and as the native asset of the Binance Smart Chain. How does BNB differ from Bitcoin? Unlike Bitcoin, which functions primarily as digital gold and a store of value, BNB operates as a utility token within a specific ecosystem. While Bitcoin was created by the pseudonymous Satoshi Nakamoto as a decentralized currency, BNB serves practical functions within the Binance platform. What factors most influence BNB‚Äôs price? Key factors include Binance exchange growth, regulatory developments, Binance Smart Chain adoption, overall cryptocurrency market trends, and BNB token burn mechanisms that reduce supply over time. Is BNB a good long-term investment? As with any cryptocurrency investment, BNB carries both potential rewards and risks. Its connection to the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange provides unique advantages, but regulatory challenges and market competition present significant uncertainties that investors must consider. Conclusion: The Path Forward for BNB The journey to $1000 for BNB involves navigating a complex landscape of technological innovation, regulatory developments, and market dynamics. While the potential exists for significant appreciation, particularly if the Binance ecosystem continues to expand and diversify, investors must approach BNB price predictions with balanced expectations. The cryptocurrency market remains inherently volatile, and even well-established tokens like BNB face uncertainties. A thoughtful investment strategy considers both the promising aspects of BNB‚Äôs utility-driven model and the challenges inherent in the rapidly evolving digital asset space. To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other major digital assets in the context of institutional adoption and regulatory evolution. title: Crucial BTC Perpetual Futures Long/Short Ratio Update Reveals Bullish Tilt
body: BitcoinWorld Crucial BTC Perpetual Futures Long/Short Ratio Update Reveals Bullish Tilt For active Bitcoin traders, understanding market sentiment is not just helpful‚Äîit‚Äôs essential. The BTC perpetual futures long/short ratio serves as a powerful, real-time gauge of trader positioning and collective bias. The latest data reveals a fascinating, albeit narrow, lean towards optimism. Let‚Äôs break down what the numbers from the top exchanges truly mean for your next move. What Does the Current BTC Perpetual Futures Long/Short Ratio Tell Us? The aggregate 24-hour data paints a clear picture: the market is delicately balanced but leaning bullish. Across the three largest exchanges by open interest‚ÄîBinance, OKX, and Bybit‚Äîthe overall BTC perpetual futures long/short ratio shows 50.26% of positions are long, versus 49.74% short. This marginal majority suggests a cautious optimism among derivatives traders. However, the real story often lies in the details of individual platform data. Exchange-by-Exchange Breakdown: Where is Sentiment Strongest? While the overall trend is slightly bullish, sentiment varies by platform. This divergence can offer nuanced insights into different trader demographics. Binance: 50.84% long / 49.16% short. The world‚Äôs largest exchange shows a definitive, though not overwhelming, preference for long positions. OKX: 50.38% long / 49.62% short. Here, the balance is almost even, indicating highly neutral or conflicted sentiment. Bybit: 51.12% long / 48.88% short. This platform exhibits the most pronounced bullish tilt in the current BTC perpetual futures long/short ratio data. These variations remind us that trader behavior is not monolithic. A deeper look at one exchange‚Äôs data can sometimes foreshadow a broader market shift. How Can Traders Use This Long/Short Ratio Data? This metric is more than just a number; it‚Äôs a tool for strategic decision-making. A high long ratio can sometimes act as a contrarian indicator, signaling that the market might be overly optimistic and due for a correction. Conversely, an extreme short ratio could indicate pervasive fear, potentially setting the stage for a squeeze. The current data, showing a slight long bias, suggests a market that is hopeful but not yet euphoric. Therefore, savvy traders monitor trends in this BTC perpetual futures long/short ratio over time, watching for sharp divergences that often precede volatility. What Are the Risks of Relying Solely on This Metric? While invaluable, the long/short ratio is not a crystal ball. It should never be used in isolation. Consider these critical points: It reflects derivatives market sentiment, not necessarily spot market conviction. It doesn‚Äôt account for the size of positions; a few large whales can skew the data. External macro factors, like regulatory news or economic data, can instantly override technical sentiment indicators. Always combine this analysis with other on-chain metrics, price action, and fundamental news. Conclusion: A Snapshot of Cautious Optimism The latest update on the BTC perpetual futures long/short ratio reveals a market on a knife‚Äôs edge, with a subtle yet consistent bias towards bullish positions across major exchanges. This data point is a crucial piece of the puzzle for anyone engaged in Bitcoin futures trading, offering a glimpse into the collective psyche of the market. By integrating this sentiment analysis with a robust, diversified trading strategy, you can navigate the markets with greater confidence and insight. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is a BTC perpetual futures long/short ratio? It is a metric that shows the percentage of open long (buy) positions versus short (sell) positions for Bitcoin perpetual futures contracts on a given exchange or across multiple exchanges. Why is the long/short ratio important? It acts as a sentiment indicator. A very high long ratio might suggest over-optimism (a potential top), while a very high short ratio might indicate excessive fear (a potential bottom). Which exchanges are most important for this data? Exchanges with the highest open interest, like Binance, OKX, and Bybit, provide the most significant and influential data due to their large trader base. Can the long/short ratio predict Bitcoin‚Äôs price? Not directly. It measures sentiment, not future price. However, extreme readings can sometimes foreshadow market reversals when used with other analysis tools. How often does this data update? Most tracking platforms and exchanges update this BTC perpetual futures long/short ratio data in real-time or on a 24-hour rolling basis. Is a 50.26% long ratio considered strongly bullish? No, it‚Äôs considered marginally or cautiously bullish. A strongly bullish signal would typically involve a much larger disparity, often above 55-60%. Found this breakdown of the BTC perpetual futures long/short ratio helpful? Share this article with fellow traders on X (Twitter) or Telegram to help them decode market sentiment and make more informed decisions! To learn more about the latest Bitcoin trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action and institutional adoption. This post Crucial BTC Perpetual Futures Long/Short Ratio Update Reveals Bullish Tilt first appeared on BitcoinWorld .
