title: Unlock New Opportunities: Binance Lists WET Perpetual Futures with 20x Leverage
body: BitcoinWorld Unlock New Opportunities: Binance Lists WET Perpetual Futures with 20x Leverage Binance, the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency exchange, just made a significant move that has traders buzzing. The platform announced it will list WET perpetual futures , opening new avenues for market participation. This contract, paired against USDT, goes live on December 10th at 7:00 a.m. UTC and supports leverage of up to 20x. For anyone involved in the WET ecosystem or crypto derivatives, this is a pivotal development worth understanding in detail. What Are WET Perpetual Futures and Why Do They Matter? If you‚Äôre new to crypto derivatives, you might wonder what the fuss is about. A perpetual futures contract is an agreement to buy or sell an asset at a predetermined price, but unlike traditional futures, it has no expiry date. This allows for continuous trading. Binance listing WET perpetual futures provides several immediate benefits for the market. First, it increases liquidity for the WET token. Second, it offers traders more sophisticated tools for hedging or speculating on WET‚Äôs price movements. Finally, it signals growing institutional and retail confidence in the asset‚Äôs longevity. How Can You Trade WET Perpetual Futures on Binance? Starting December 10th, accessing this new market is straightforward. You will find the WET/USDT perpetual contract listed in the Binance Futures trading section. The exchange has set the leverage multiplier at a maximum of 20x. This means you can control a position worth 20 times your initial margin. However, while this amplifies potential gains, it also magnifies potential losses. Therefore, it‚Äôs crucial to approach leverage with a clear risk management strategy. Key steps to get started include: Ensuring your Binance account is verified and funded. Transferring funds to your Binance Futures wallet. Familiarizing yourself with the futures trading interface and order types. Setting stop-loss and take-profit orders to manage risk automatically. What Are the Key Opportunities and Risks to Consider? The introduction of WET perpetual futures creates exciting opportunities. Traders can now speculate on WET‚Äôs price direction without owning the underlying token, potentially profiting from both upward and downward moves. It also allows for more complex strategies like arbitrage. For the WET project itself, this listing on a major exchange like Binance enhances visibility and credibility. However, the 20x leverage is a double-edged sword. The crypto market is notoriously volatile, and high leverage can lead to rapid liquidation if the market moves against your position. Always trade with capital you can afford to lose. How Does This Fit Into the Broader Crypto Landscape? Binance‚Äôs decision is part of a larger trend of crypto exchanges expanding their derivatives offerings. Perpetual futures have become a cornerstone of crypto trading, offering the flexibility that traditional expiry-based contracts lack. By adding WET to its roster, Binance is responding to user demand and validating the token‚Äôs market presence. This move could potentially lead to increased trading volume and price discovery for WET, influencing its spot market dynamics as well. It‚Äôs a clear sign of the maturing infrastructure surrounding digital assets. Conclusion: A Strategic Move for Traders and the WET Ecosystem In summary, the listing of WET perpetual futures on Binance is a strategic development that benefits multiple parties. It provides traders with a powerful new instrument, grants the WET project increased market exposure, and reinforces Binance‚Äôs position as a comprehensive trading hub. As with any leveraged product, education and caution are paramount. By understanding the mechanics of perpetual contracts and implementing sound risk management, traders can navigate this new opportunity effectively. The market will be watching closely when trading commences on December 10th. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q: When exactly will Binance list WET perpetual futures? A: The WET/USDT perpetual futures contract will be available for trading starting at 7:00 a.m. UTC on December 10. Q: What is the maximum leverage for the WET perpetual contract? A: The contract will support leverage of up to 20x on the Binance Futures platform. Q: Do I need to own WET tokens to trade WET perpetual futures? A: No. Perpetual futures are derivative contracts. You are trading a contract based on WET‚Äôs price, not the actual token. You settle in USDT. Q: What are the main risks of trading with 20x leverage? A: The primary risk is liquidation. A small price move against your position can result in the loss of your entire margin. Leverage amplifies both profits and losses. Q: How does this listing benefit the WET project? A: It increases liquidity, provides better price discovery, attracts more traders and attention, and enhances the token‚Äôs overall credibility by being listed on a major exchange‚Äôs derivatives market. Q: Where can I learn more about trading futures on Binance? A: Binance Academy offers comprehensive educational resources on futures trading, leverage, and risk management. It‚Äôs highly recommended to study these before trading. Found this guide on WET perpetual futures helpful? Share it with your network on X (Twitter), Telegram, or LinkedIn to help other traders stay informed about this major Binance listing. Knowledge is power in the fast-moving crypto world! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency derivatives trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the futures market and institutional adoption. This post Unlock New Opportunities: Binance Lists WET Perpetual Futures with 20x Leverage first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: LBank BoostHub to list Kyo Finance (KYO) with 100,000 Token in Rewards
body: Singapore, Singapore, December 10th, 2025, Chainwire LBank , the leading crypto exchange, has announced the upcoming launch of Kyo Finance (KYO) on its innovative BoostHub platform. To celebrate this listing, LBank BoostHub will host an exclusive reward campaign, distributing a total of 100,000 KYO tokens to eligible participants. Participation for the KYO token allocation is now open on BoostHub, and two pools are available for users meeting the eligibility requirements: Smart Pool - Hard Cap: 200 KYO Requirements: Minimum holding of 1,000 USDT & at least one completed spot or futures trade. Futures Pool - Hard Cap: 400 KYO Requirements: Average net asset value of 1,000 USDT. All users can register, and the KYO will be distributed on December 17, 18:00 SGT. title: Tron Price Prediction 2025-2030: The Ultimate Guide to TRX‚Äôs $1 Breakthrough Potential

What remains certain is that Tron has established itself as a significant blockchain platform with a dedicated community and clear vision for decentralized technology. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned cryptocurrency investor or new to blockchain technology, understanding Tron‚Äôs potential requires balancing optimism with realism, recognizing both the transformative possibilities and inherent uncertainties of this emerging asset class. The coming years will reveal whether Tron can achieve its ambitious targets, but one thing is clear: the blockchain revolution continues, and Tron intends to play a major role in shaping its future. Frequently Asked Questions Who founded Tron and what is their background? Tron was founded by Justin Sun , a Chinese entrepreneur and former representative for Ripple in Greater China. He is also the founder of the BitTorrent Foundation and has been involved in various blockchain and technology ventures. What companies are building on the Tron blockchain? Several notable companies and projects are building on Tron, including BitTorrent , which was acquired by the Tron Foundation, and various decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols and gaming applications within the TRON DAO ecosystem. How does Tron compare to other smart contract platforms? Tron competes with platforms like Ethereum , Solana , and Cardano in the smart contract platform space. Each has different technical approaches, consensus mechanisms, and ecosystem focuses, with Tron emphasizing high throughput and entertainment applications. What is the TRON DAO and how does it govern the network? The TRON DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) is the community-governance structure that oversees the Tron network. title: Rep. Keith Self Files Amendment to Prevent a US CBDC in Defense Bill
body: Rep. Keith Self (R-Texas) on Tuesday introduced an amendment to the massive annual defense bill that would block the creation of a US central bank digital currency . Key Takeaways: Rep. Keith Self moved to add an anti-CBDC amendment back into the defense bill. Conservatives say GOP leaders broke a promise to include CBDC restrictions. The amendment would block a Fed digital dollar and protect cash-like privacy. Self said GOP leaders had previously promised that anti-CBDC language would be included in the legislation, but it was missing from the version released Sunday. ‚ÄúPromises were broken to include this language in the NDAA,‚Äù he wrote on X . ‚ÄúMy amendment would fix the bill.‚Äù House Pushes Ahead on Defense Bill as Self Seeks to Block Fed Digital Dollar House leaders are aiming to pass the defense package on Wednesday afternoon, according to Politico, though negotiations remain fluid. Self‚Äôs proposal, titled the ‚ÄúAnti-CBDC Surveillance State‚Äù amendment, would bar the Federal Reserve from developing, testing, or issuing a central bank digital currency, or any similar digital asset under a different name. It would also prohibit Federal Reserve banks from offering accounts or financial services directly to individuals, a move supporters say is critical to preventing government-controlled consumer banking. The amendment includes an exception for ‚Äúdollar-denominated currency that is open, permissionless, and private,‚Äù a carve-out aimed at ensuring paper-cash-level privacy protections. The broader defense bill, formally known as the annual authorization for Pentagon spending and policy, spans more than 3,000 pages and is typically considered one of Congress‚Äôs few must-pass measures each year. The absence of the CBDC language angered conservatives, who saw it as a retreat from earlier commitments. Self told Fox Business that House Republicans had been promised the amendment authored by Majority Whip Tom Emmer, one of Congress‚Äôs most outspoken CBDC critics. After reviewing the bill, Self said it was clear the provision had been dropped. ‚ÄúWe have to pass an NDAA, because it‚Äôs one of the must-pass bills we have in Congress,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve got to fix it and get it passed.‚Äù Conservatives were promised that language banning a Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) would be included in the must-pass National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA). Unconscionably, it wasn't included. Leadership needs to fix this bill IMMEDIATELY. pic.twitter.com/r9RxsmTctk ‚Äî Rep. Keith Self (@RepKeithSelf) December 8, 2025 CBDC Could Give Government Control Over Americans‚Äô Money Several Republicans echoed his frustration. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) said she supports cryptocurrency but opposes any system that could allow the federal government to restrict how Americans use their money. Rep. Warren Davidson (R-Ohio) warned that a CBDC would ‚Äúinsert the government between you and your money‚Äù and said Congress must pass a statutory ban, not rely solely on executive action. Earlier this year, President Trump signed an executive order barring federal agencies from issuing or promoting any form of CBDC, citing risks to privacy and national sovereignty. However, House GOP aides told The Hill that negotiations over a separate bipartisan housing package derailed efforts to include a CBDC ban in the defense bill, saying the final language ‚Äúwas not something that was ultimately going to be acceptable to our members.‚Äù The post Rep. Keith Self Files Amendment to Prevent a US CBDC in Defense Bill appeared first on Cryptonews .

Stunning Prediction: Bitwise CEO Forecasts Major Crypto Bull Market in 2026
body: BitcoinWorld Stunning Prediction: Bitwise CEO Forecasts Major Crypto Bull Market in 2026 Hold onto your digital wallets. Bitwise CEO Hunter Horsley just made a bold declaration that could reshape your investment strategy. He predicts a major crypto bull market is on the horizon for 2026, challenging everything we thought we knew about cryptocurrency cycles. This isn‚Äôt just another price prediction‚Äîit‚Äôs a fundamental reassessment of how crypto markets mature. Let‚Äôs explore why this forecast matters and what it means for your portfolio. Why Is the 2026 Crypto Bull Market Prediction So Significant? Hunter Horsley‚Äôs forecast carries weight because it comes from a leading voice in institutional crypto investing. Bitwise manages billions in digital assets, giving Horsley a front-row seat to market movements. His prediction breaks from the traditional four-year cycle theory that many investors still follow. Instead, he argues the market has fundamentally matured. This shift means old patterns may no longer apply, requiring investors to think differently about timing and strategy. According to Horsley, we‚Äôve actually been in a bear market since February. Corporate buying from giants like MicroStrategy created artificial upward pressure that masked the true trend. This insight is crucial because it helps explain recent market confusion. When major corporations make strategic investments, they can temporarily distort natural market cycles. However, these distortions eventually resolve, setting the stage for the next genuine growth phase. What Changed in the Crypto Market Cycle? The traditional four-year cycle tied to Bitcoin halving events might be obsolete. Horsley suggests several factors have transformed the landscape: Institutional adoption has created new buying patterns Regulatory clarity in major markets reduces uncertainty Infrastructure development makes crypto more accessible Diversified use cases beyond pure speculation These changes mean the market now responds to different drivers. While retail investors once dominated price action, institutional players now significantly influence trends. This maturation suggests the next crypto bull market could be more sustained and less volatile than previous cycles. The wild swings of early crypto years might give way to more measured, fundamental-driven growth. How Should Investors Prepare for the 2026 Bull Run? If Horsley‚Äôs prediction proves accurate, strategic preparation becomes essential. First, understand that timing matters less than position. Trying to perfectly time market bottoms often leads to missed opportunities. Instead, consider dollar-cost averaging‚Äîregular investments regardless of short-term price movements. This approach reduces risk while ensuring participation in long-term growth. Second, diversification remains crucial. While Bitcoin often leads crypto bull market cycles, other assets may offer different risk-reward profiles. Research projects with strong fundamentals, active development teams, and real-world utility. The coming years should see continued separation between serious projects and mere speculation. Finally, maintain realistic expectations. Even if a major crypto bull market arrives in 2026, markets rarely move in straight lines. Prepare for volatility along the way. Set clear investment goals and risk parameters before market excitement potentially clouds judgment. Remember that sustainable wealth building in crypto, as in traditional markets, requires discipline and patience. What Are the Potential Challenges Ahead? While the prediction offers optimism, several challenges could affect the timeline. Regulatory developments in major economies like the United States and European Union will significantly impact institutional participation. Technological hurdles around scalability and energy consumption need continued addressing. Moreover, global economic conditions always influence risk assets like cryptocurrencies. However, each challenge also represents an opportunity for market maturation. Regulatory clarity, while sometimes restrictive short-term, creates long-term stability that attracts conservative capital. Technological improvements enhance utility and efficiency. The very obstacles that concern investors today may become the foundations for tomorrow‚Äôs growth. The key is distinguishing between temporary setbacks and fundamental threats to the crypto ecosystem. Conclusion: A New Era for Crypto Investing Hunter Horsley‚Äôs 2026 crypto bull market prediction represents more than just a price forecast‚Äîit signals crypto‚Äôs evolution from niche experiment to established asset class. The broken four-year cycle suggests growing maturity, while corporate investment patterns reveal increasing mainstream acceptance. For investors, this means adapting strategies to a changing landscape where fundamentals may matter more than cyclical timing. The coming years will test whether this vision materializes. Meanwhile, staying informed, managing risk, and focusing on long-term value creation offer the best path forward. The potential for a major crypto bull market in 2026 reminds us that despite recent volatility, the digital asset revolution continues advancing, creating opportunities for prepared investors. Frequently Asked Questions What exactly is a crypto bull market? A crypto bull market refers to a sustained period of rising prices across the cryptocurrency market, typically accompanied by increased investor optimism, trading volume, and media attention. Why does Hunter Horsley think the four-year cycle is over? Horsley believes institutional adoption, regulatory developments, and market maturation have fundamentally changed cryptocurrency market dynamics, making old patterns less reliable predictors. Should I invest now or wait until 2026? Most financial advisors recommend against trying to time markets perfectly. Dollar-cost averaging‚Äîinvesting fixed amounts regularly‚Äîoften proves more effective than attempting to predict exact market bottoms or tops. What cryptocurrencies might lead the next bull market? While Bitcoin typically leads major cycles, established projects with strong fundamentals, active development, and real-world utility often perform well during sustained bull markets. How can I protect myself if the prediction is wrong? Diversification across asset classes, clear risk management strategies, and investing only what you can afford to lose provide protection against incorrect market predictions. What signs should I watch for as 2026 approaches? Key indicators include institutional adoption rates, regulatory developments, technological advancements, trading volume patterns, and broader economic conditions affecting risk assets. Found this analysis helpful? Share this article with fellow investors on your social media channels to help them prepare for potential market developments. Knowledge sharing strengthens the entire crypto community as we navigate these evolving markets together. title: Solana Price Prediction 2025-2030: Will SOL‚Äôs Remarkable Surge Reach $500?
body: BitcoinWorld Solana Price Prediction 2025-2030: Will SOL‚Äôs Remarkable Surge Reach $500? Solana has emerged as one of the most talked-about cryptocurrencies in recent years, capturing the attention of investors worldwide. With its lightning-fast transaction speeds and growing ecosystem, many are wondering: could SOL realistically reach $500 in the coming years? This comprehensive Solana price prediction analysis examines the factors that could drive SOL‚Äôs value through 2030, providing insights for both new and experienced cryptocurrency investors. Understanding Solana‚Äôs Current Market Position Before diving into specific SOL price targets, it‚Äôs crucial to understand what makes Solana unique. Unlike many blockchain networks that struggle with scalability, Solana boasts transaction speeds of up to 65,000 per second with fees averaging just $0.00025. This technical advantage has attracted hundreds of projects to its ecosystem, from decentralized finance platforms to NFT marketplaces. The network‚Äôs Proof-of-History consensus mechanism represents a significant innovation in blockchain technology , potentially giving Solana a competitive edge as adoption increases. Key Factors Influencing Solana Price Predictions Several critical elements will determine whether Solana can achieve ambitious price targets like $500. First, network adoption continues to expand, with daily active addresses consistently numbering in the hundreds of thousands. Second, institutional interest has grown substantially, with major investment firms adding SOL to their portfolios. Third, technological developments, including the upcoming Firedancer upgrade, promise to enhance network stability and performance. Finally, broader cryptocurrency forecast trends suggest that altcoins with strong fundamentals may outperform during the next market cycle. Solana Price Prediction 2025: The Road to Recovery Looking specifically at 2025, most analysts project a bullish scenario for Solana if several conditions align. The table below summarizes key price ranges based on different market conditions: Market Scenario Price Range Key Drivers Conservative $150 ‚Äì $250 Moderate adoption, stable market conditions Moderate $250 ‚Äì $400 Strong ecosystem growth, institutional inflows Bullish $400 ‚Äì $600 Mass adoption, technological breakthroughs, favorable regulations The $500 target falls within the bullish scenario for 2025, requiring sustained network growth and positive crypto market analysis trends. Several technical indicators suggest this is possible if Solana maintains its current trajectory of development and adoption. Solana Price Prediction 2026-2028: The Growth Phase Between 2026 and 2028, Solana‚Äôs price could experience significant volatility but potentially establish higher support levels. Key developments during this period might include: Mainstream adoption of blockchain applications built on Solana Increased institutional investment in the SOL token Technological improvements addressing previous network stability concerns Expansion into new markets and use cases beyond current applications During this phase, the SOL price could test resistance levels between $600 and $800 if the broader cryptocurrency market enters a sustained bull cycle. However, investors should remain aware of potential challenges, including regulatory developments and competition from other layer-1 blockchains. Solana Price Prediction 2030: Long-Term Vision Looking toward 2030, Solana‚Äôs price will largely depend on its ability to maintain technological leadership and ecosystem growth. Some analysts project that SOL could reach between $1,000 and $2,000 by the end of the decade if several conditions are met: Global adoption of decentralized applications reaches critical mass Solana captures significant market share in key sectors like DeFi and gaming The network demonstrates consistent reliability and security over time Blockchain technology becomes integrated into mainstream financial systems While these projections are speculative, they highlight the tremendous potential that many see in Solana‚Äôs underlying blockchain technology . The path to these price levels won‚Äôt be linear, but the fundamental case for Solana remains strong according to most cryptocurrency forecast models. What Could Derail Solana‚Äôs Growth? Despite optimistic Solana price prediction scenarios, investors must consider potential risks. Network outages in the past have raised concerns about reliability, though the development team has made significant improvements. Regulatory uncertainty remains a challenge for all cryptocurrencies, and increased competition from other scalable blockchains could pressure Solana‚Äôs market position. Additionally, broader economic factors, including interest rate changes and macroeconomic conditions, significantly influence all crypto market analysis outcomes. How Should Investors Approach SOL? For those considering adding Solana to their portfolio, several strategies can help manage risk while capturing potential upside: Dollar-cost averaging rather than timing the market Allocating only a portion of your portfolio to higher-risk assets like SOL Staying informed about network developments and ecosystem growth Setting realistic profit targets and stop-loss levels based on your risk tolerance Remember that all cryptocurrency forecast models involve uncertainty, and past performance doesn‚Äôt guarantee future results. The SOL price will likely experience significant volatility regardless of long-term direction. Conclusion: Is $500 Realistic for Solana? Based on current analysis, Solana reaching $500 represents an ambitious but plausible target within the 2025-2026 timeframe. The combination of technological advantages, growing ecosystem, and increasing institutional interest creates a compelling case for SOL‚Äôs continued appreciation. However, achieving this milestone depends on multiple factors aligning favorably, including broader market conditions, regulatory developments, and successful execution of Solana‚Äôs roadmap. For investors, the key is balancing optimism about Solana‚Äôs potential with realistic risk management strategies. To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping blockchain technology adoption and institutional investment patterns. Frequently Asked Questions What makes Solana different from other cryptocurrencies? Solana stands out for its high transaction speeds and low fees, achieved through its unique Proof-of-History consensus mechanism. This makes it particularly attractive for applications requiring fast settlement times. Who founded Solana? Solana was founded by Anatoly Yakovenko , who previously worked at Qualcomm and Dropbox. The project launched in March 2020 after several years of development. What companies are building on Solana? Major projects on Solana include Raydium (a decentralized exchange), Magic Eden (an NFT marketplace), and FTX (though its future involvement is uncertain following recent events). How does Solana compare to Ethereum? While Ethereum currently dominates in terms of total value locked and developer activity, Solana offers significantly faster and cheaper transactions. The two networks often serve different use cases within the broader blockchain ecosystem. What are the main risks of investing in Solana? Key risks include network stability concerns (though improving), regulatory uncertainty, competition from other layer-1 solutions, and general cryptocurrency market volatility that affects all digital assets regardless of fundamentals. Ethereum Price Prediction: Can ETH Reach $10k by 2030?
body: BitcoinWorld Ethereum Price Prediction: Can ETH Reach $10k by 2030? Ethereum stands at a critical juncture in its evolution. As the leading smart contract platform and the foundation of decentralized finance, its price trajectory captures global attention. Investors, developers, and analysts alike are asking one burning question: Can Ethereum reach $10,000? This comprehensive Ethereum price prediction examines the factors that could propel ETH to new heights or present significant challenges through 2025, 2026, and beyond to 2030. Understanding Ethereum‚Äôs Current Market Position Before diving into future predictions, we must understand Ethereum‚Äôs present context. Ethereum remains the dominant platform for decentralized applications, hosting thousands of projects across DeFi, NFTs, and Web3. The successful transition to proof-of-stake through ‚ÄúThe Merge‚Äù fundamentally changed Ethereum‚Äôs economic model, reducing issuance and introducing staking rewards. This shift creates a more deflationary environment for ETH, directly impacting its long-term ETH price forecast potential. Ethereum Price Prediction 2025: The Bull Case Looking toward 2025, several catalysts could drive Ethereum‚Äôs price significantly higher. The continued development of Ethereum 2.0, particularly further scalability improvements through sharding, could dramatically increase network throughput and reduce transaction costs. This would enhance Ethereum‚Äôs competitive position against layer-2 solutions and alternative blockchains. Key factors for 2025 include: Institutional adoption through ETF approvals Regulatory clarity in major markets Continued growth of DeFi and NFT ecosystems Macroeconomic conditions and Bitcoin halving effects Most analysts project a Ethereum 2025 price range between $6,000 and $8,500 under favorable conditions. This represents substantial growth from current levels but falls short of the $10,000 milestone. Technical Analysis and Historical Patterns Technical analysis provides another lens for evaluating Ethereum‚Äôs potential. Historical price action shows that ETH tends to follow Bitcoin‚Äôs market cycles but with amplified volatility. The table below compares previous cycle peaks with potential future targets: Cycle Previous Peak Next Cycle Projection Growth Multiple 2017-2018 $1,400 N/A N/A 2020-2021 $4,800 N/A 3.4x 2024-2025 Projected $6,000-$8,500 1.25-1.77x 2028-2030 Projected $8,000-$12,000 1.33-1.41x These projections suggest that reaching $10,000 may require multiple market cycles and sustained adoption. Ethereum 2030: The Long-Term Vision Looking further ahead to 2030, the ETH 2030 outlook depends on Ethereum maintaining its first-mover advantage in smart contracts while successfully scaling to meet global demand. By this timeframe, several critical developments should be fully realized: Complete implementation of Ethereum 2.0 with full sharding Mass adoption of decentralized applications across industries Integration with traditional finance and global payment systems Potential regulatory frameworks supporting blockchain innovation For Ethereum $10k to become reality by 2030, Ethereum would need to achieve a market capitalization approaching $1.2 trillion. While ambitious, this represents approximately a 4x increase from previous all-time highs and aligns with the growth trajectories of other transformative technologies. Challenges and Risks to Consider No Ethereum price prediction would be complete without addressing significant challenges. Ethereum faces intense competition from alternative layer-1 blockchains offering higher throughput and lower fees. Regulatory uncertainty remains a persistent concern, particularly regarding staking, DeFi protocols, and token classification. Additionally, technological risks include potential security vulnerabilities in new consensus mechanisms and smart contracts. Other considerations include: Network congestion and high gas fees during bull markets Concentration of staked ETH among large entities Environmental concerns despite proof-of-stake transition Macroeconomic factors affecting all risk assets Expert Opinions and Market Sentiment Industry experts offer varied perspectives on Ethereum‚Äôs potential. Some analysts point to Ethereum‚Äôs strong developer community and network effects as reasons for optimism. Others caution that technological disruption could come from unexpected directions. The consensus suggests that while $10,000 is achievable within this decade, it would require nearly perfect execution and favorable market conditions. Key voices in the space emphasize different aspects: Vitalik Buterin focuses on technical scalability and decentralization Institutional analysts highlight adoption metrics and revenue potential Traders watch on-chain data and market structure developments Developers monitor ecosystem growth and innovation pace Actionable Insights for Investors Based on this ETH price forecast analysis, investors should consider several strategies. Dollar-cost averaging reduces timing risk in volatile markets. Diversification across crypto assets mitigates platform-specific risks. Staying informed about network upgrades and ecosystem developments provides context for price movements. Most importantly, investors should only allocate capital they can afford to lose, given cryptocurrency‚Äôs inherent volatility. Frequently Asked Questions What is the most realistic Ethereum price prediction for 2025? Most analysts project Ethereum trading between $6,000 and $8,500 in 2025, assuming continued adoption and favorable market conditions. Who created Ethereum and how does this affect its future? Ethereum was co-founded by Vitalik Buterin along with other developers. Buterin‚Äôs continued involvement and vision for Ethereum 2.0 significantly influence its development roadmap. What companies are building on Ethereum that could drive its price? Major organizations building on Ethereum include ConsenSys , Coinbase through its Base network, and numerous DeFi protocols like Uniswap and Aave . How does Ethereum compare to Bitcoin in long-term potential? While Bitcoin serves primarily as digital gold and a store of value, Ethereum functions as a programmable platform for decentralized applications, giving it different growth drivers and risk profiles. What are the biggest threats to Ethereum reaching $10,000? Primary threats include regulatory crackdowns, successful competition from alternative blockchains, technological failures in scaling solutions, and prolonged bear markets in cryptocurrency. Conclusion: The Path to $10,000 Ethereum‚Äôs journey to $10,000 represents both an ambitious price target and a symbolic milestone for blockchain adoption. Our analysis suggests this achievement is possible by 2030 but not guaranteed. The path requires successful execution of Ethereum‚Äôs technical roadmap, sustained ecosystem growth, and favorable macroeconomic conditions. While short-term volatility will continue, Ethereum‚Äôs fundamental value proposition as the leading smart contract platform provides a strong foundation for long-term appreciation. The coming years will test whether Ethereum can scale to meet global demand while maintaining its decentralized principles. Revolutionary Quantum Wallet: FANC‚Äôs Bold Shift to Unbreakable Wallet-Centric Security
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Quantum Wallet: FANC‚Äôs Bold Shift to Unbreakable Wallet-Centric Security Imagine a world where your cryptocurrency is truly yours, secured by technology so advanced it can withstand the computers of tomorrow. That future is arriving now. Blockchain infrastructure developer FANC is making a pivotal move by shifting security focus from vulnerable exchanges directly to your personal wallet with its groundbreaking Quantum Wallet . This initiative responds directly to recent high-profile hacks in South Korea and the looming threat of quantum computing. Why is Wallet-Centric Security the Ultimate Game-Changer? For years, the mantra has been ‚Äúnot your keys, not your crypto,‚Äù highlighting the risks of leaving assets on exchanges. Recent attacks on major platforms like Upbit and Coupang have proven this point. FANC‚Äôs strategy flips the script. Instead of relying on a central entity‚Äôs security, the Quantum Wallet empowers you. It places cutting-edge, quantum-resistant protection directly in your hands. This is a fundamental shift from trusting a third party to trusting impregnable, personal technology. What Makes the Quantum Wallet So Powerful? The core of this innovation is Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC), technology transferred from South Korea‚Äôs prestigious Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute (ETRI). But what does that mean for you? Quantum-Resistant Design: Every process‚Äîfrom creation to signing transactions‚Äîuses PQC algorithms built to withstand attacks from future quantum computers. Direct Implementation: The security is applied at the wallet level itself, not as an add-on layer. Proactive Defense: It solves tomorrow‚Äôs security problem today, before quantum computers become a commercial threat. This approach ensures that the Quantum Wallet isn‚Äôt just another digital wallet; it‚Äôs a fortress designed for the next era of computing. How Will the Quantum Wallet Roll Out and Expand? FANC has a clear, phased plan for deployment. The Quantum Wallet won‚Äôt launch in isolation. Its integration will be strategic and expansive. Initial Ecosystem: First implementation will occur within FANC‚Äôs own ecosystem and the Celebe platform, serving as a controlled proving ground. Broader Integration: The roadmap includes expanding to external services and enabling secure payments on partner platforms. User-Centric Growth: This phased approach allows for refinement based on real-world use before wide-scale adoption. Therefore, the wallet is designed to grow from a specialized tool into a widely-used standard for secure crypto transactions. What Are the Real-World Benefits for Crypto Users? Moving to a wallet-centric security model with a tool like the Quantum Wallet offers tangible advantages. You gain unparalleled control and peace of mind. Your assets are protected by the most advanced cryptography available, directly on your device. Moreover, it reduces systemic risk. Even if a major exchange is compromised, assets in properly secured individual wallets remain safe. This model champions true decentralization and personal sovereignty, which are the original promises of blockchain technology. Conclusion: Securing the Future, One Wallet at a Time FANC‚Äôs development of the Quantum Wallet represents more than a product launch; it signals a necessary evolution in cryptocurrency security philosophy. By proactively addressing quantum threats and decentralizing security, FANC is not just solving for today‚Äôs hacks but fortifying the entire ecosystem for tomorrow‚Äôs challenges. This wallet-centric approach could very well set the new gold standard, making personal custody both the safest and most sensible choice for every crypto holder. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC)? Post-Quantum Cryptography refers to cryptographic algorithms designed to be secure against an attack by a quantum computer. Traditional encryption, like RSA, could be broken by quantum machines, but PQC algorithms are built to resist this. When will the Quantum Wallet be available? FANC has announced the development plan and the technology transfer from ETRI. While a specific public launch date isn‚Äôt provided, the initial rollout will be within the FANC and Celebe ecosystems first. Do I need a quantum computer to use the Quantum Wallet? No, you do not. The Quantum Wallet uses PQC algorithms to protect against future quantum computers, but it functions on standard devices like smartphones and computers today. How is this different from a hardware wallet? A hardware wallet stores private keys offline on a physical device. The Quantum Wallet focuses on the type of cryptography used (PQC). It could potentially be implemented in various forms, including software or hardware, but its defining feature is its quantum-resistant code. Will this wallet work with Bitcoin and Ethereum? The announcement states plans for integration with external services. While initial focus is on FANC‚Äôs ecosystem, the goal is to expand, which likely includes compatibility with major blockchain networks. Is wallet-centric security safer than exchange security? In principle, yes. Wallet-centric security gives you direct control, eliminating the ‚Äúsingle point of failure‚Äù risk of a centralized exchange. However, it also places the responsibility for safeguarding private keys entirely on the user. Found this insight into the future of crypto security valuable? Help others stay safe and informed by sharing this article on your social media channels. The shift to wallet-centric security is crucial knowledge for every investor in the space. title: Tidal Trust II targets after-hours trading with ‚ÄòAfterDark‚Äô Bitcoin ETF bet
body: Investment firm Tidal Trust II has filed with the U.S. SEC for a BTC ETF that will only offer ‚ÄúAfterDark‚Äù exposure to BTC when Wall Street closes. The Nicholas Bitcoin and Treasuries AfterDark ETF fund will also hold short-term U.S. Treasuries during the day, mirroring BTC‚Äôs overnight return profile for U.S. investors. According to the filing, Tidal‚Äôs AfterDark ETF will not hold Bitcoin as the primary asset, but track the coin‚Äôs performance by investing in spot BTC ETFs, futures contracts, and options on indices. The company describes itself as a white label ETF solutions provider, with its filing prominently featuring an image for XFunds by Nicholas Wealth. Meanwhile, the Nicholas Bitcoin and Treasuries AfterDark ETF‚Äôs investment goal is to seek long-term capital appreciation. The fund will obtain BTC exposure through investment in Bitcoin Futures, U.S.-listed ETPs and/or ETFs, and Bitcoin Options. However, neither the U.S. SEC nor the CFTC has approved or disapproved of these securities. Balchunas agrees that most BTC gains are typically after hours BITCOIN AFTER DARK: new filing for an ETF that will only hold bitcoin at night, buying it when the US market closes and selling it when it opens. pic.twitter.com/0RrQTuP21t ‚Äî Eric Balchunas (@EricBalchunas) December 9, 2025 Bloomberg‚Äôs Senior ETF analyst Eric Blachunas said he and other analysts looked at the idea last year and found that most Bitcoin gains occur after hours. He believes that the Bitcoin AfterDark ETF will yield better returns, although he notes that this will have to wait until the actual ETF begins trading. Meanwhile, the fund will represent one of the most unusual timing-based strategies yet seen in the BTC ETF ecosystem. Balchunas notes that the fund will hold BTC exclusively during overnight trading, then exit positions before the U.S. market opens. Several analyses in the past have revealed the disproportionate upside that occurs when U.S. equity markets go offline. The analyses particularly highlight the periods of overlap between Asia and Europe when crypto liquidity remains active. Additionally, the overnight behavior of BTC prices is now influential enough to impact the design of ETFs. Specialized BTC products, such as the proposed AfterDark BTC ETF, signal a maturing institutional market rather than plain speculation. Meanwhile, data retrieved from SoSoValue on December 9 shows that U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs saw a net inflow of over $150 million despite an outflow of about $136 million from BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT. Fidelity‚Äôs FBTC led with inflows of roughly $190 million, while Grascale‚Äôs GBTC experienced its first positive flow since November 22 at $17.5 million. The cumulative total net inflow as of December 9 was $ 57.71 billion, bringing the total net assets to $122.1 billion (+6.57%). Tidal‚Äôs U.S. SEC filing breaks down principal investment risks According to the filing, an investment in the fund, like any other investment, entails risks. The fund may not achieve its investment goal, and there is a risk that investors could lose all or part of their investments in the fund. The fund‚Äôs indirect investment in BTC exposes it to the unique risks associated with the coin‚Äôs volatility, which is influenced by changes in the Bitcoin network, fluctuating acceptance levels, and unpredictable usage trends. Some or all of these risks may also adversely affect the fund‚Äôs net asset value (NAV) per share, trading price, total return, yield, and/or its ability to meet its objectives. The adoption and use of other blockchains, which support advanced applications such as smart contracts, also present challenges to Bitcoin‚Äôs dominance, potentially impacting its long-term relevance and utility. The development and use of Layer 2 solutions are also crucial for the functionality and scalability of Bitcoin, but they introduce risks, such as off-chain transaction execution, which could compromise security and transparency. Derivatives risk, counterparty risk, underlying fund risk, and non-diversification risk are the other types of risks identified in the Tidal Trust II U.S. SEC filing. The AfterDark ETF is also expected to face risks associated with ETFs, regulated investment company tax risk, and new fund risk, among others. Don‚Äôt just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .

title: Crypto Restructuring: Four Pillars Forecasts a Transformative 2026 for Digital Assets
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Restructuring: Four Pillars Forecasts a Transformative 2026 for Digital Assets According to leading research firm Four Pillars, the cryptocurrency market stands on the brink of a profound transformation. Their 2026 Outlook: RESTRUCTURING report argues that new U.S. regulations are not just rules‚Äîthey are the blueprint for a complete market overhaul. This shift moves crypto beyond speculation and into a phase of tangible, real-world utility. Let‚Äôs explore why 2026 is being dubbed the year of crypto restructuring and what it means for investors and builders. Why Is 2026 the Year of Crypto Restructuring? Four Pillars CEO Steve Kim points to a pivotal change: the formal integration of crypto into the U.S. institutional framework. The passage of the GENIUS and CLARITY Acts provided the regulatory clarity that was missing for years. This clarity acts as a catalyst. It allows traditional finance to engage confidently, forcing the crypto sector to mature. The market is now reorganizing its very structure around sustainable use cases, not just hype. This foundational shift is the core of the predicted crypto restructuring . What Are the Key Drivers of This Transformation? The report highlights several interconnected trends that will define the coming year. These are not isolated developments but parts of a larger, cohesive movement toward a more mature ecosystem. Real-World Asset Tokenization: Expect significant growth in tokenizing stocks and other traditional assets, bridging old and new finance. AI-Powered Investing: Automated, AI-based investment platforms will become more sophisticated, managing crypto portfolios with greater efficiency. The Evolution of Exchanges: Centralized exchanges will adapt, while DeFi services become seamlessly integrated into everyday applications. This crypto restructuring focuses on building practical infrastructure that serves actual economic activity. How Will Technology Mature During This Phase? Beyond financial products, the underlying technology stack will see critical advancements. The report emphasizes the maturation of smart contract platforms beyond simple transactions. Furthermore, decentralized storage solutions will grow, addressing critical data sovereignty needs. On the Ethereum front, developments in Zero-Knowledge Virtual Machines (ZKVM) and proof markets will enhance scalability and privacy. These technical leaps provide the necessary tools for the broader market crypto restructuring to succeed. What Does Restructuring Mean for the Average User? For users, this shift translates to better, safer, and more useful products. Imagine using a ‚Äúsuper-app‚Äù powered by a stablecoin like USDT for payments, investing, and loans all in one place. Prediction markets will become more data-driven, offering clearer insights. Abstraction stacks will hide blockchain complexity, making interactions seamless. The entire experience will feel less like navigating a frontier and more like using refined digital tools. This user-centric focus is the ultimate goal of the crypto restructuring . Conclusion: A Foundation for the Future The 2026 forecast from Four Pillars paints a picture of a market moving from adolescence to adulthood. The crypto restructuring is a necessary, albeit challenging, process. It is driven by regulation, built on technological progress, and aimed at creating real utility. While volatility may remain, the underlying direction is toward stability, integration, and tangible value creation. This restructuring lays the foundation for the next decade of blockchain innovation. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What does ‚Äúcrypto restructuring‚Äù mean? It refers to the cryptocurrency market reorganizing its fundamental structure, shifting focus from speculative trading to building sustainable, real-world applications and integrating with traditional finance. What triggered this predicted restructuring? The main trigger is regulatory clarity from new U.S. laws like the GENIUS and CLARITY Acts, which give institutions the confidence to participate and build. How will AI affect crypto investing? AI will power more automated and sophisticated investment platforms, analyzing vast amounts of data to manage risk and optimize crypto portfolios with minimal human intervention. What is a USDT super-app? It‚Äôs a hypothetical all-in-one application where the USDT stablecoin is used for various financial services like payments, trading, lending, and more within a single interface. Is this restructuring good for Bitcoin and Ethereum? Generally, yes. A more mature, regulated, and utility-driven ecosystem increases overall legitimacy and can drive adoption for major assets, though it also increases competition from new use cases. Did you find this insight into the future of crypto valuable? Help others navigate this transformation by sharing this article on your social media channels. The conversation about crypto restructuring is just beginning. To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum and Bitcoin price action and institutional adoption. This post Crypto Restructuring: Four Pillars Forecasts a Transformative 2026 for Digital Assets first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Tajikistan Imposes Criminal Penalties for Crypto Miners Using Stolen Power
body: The Tajikistan parliament has approved revisions to the Criminal Code, introducing Article 253(2), which imposes penalties on miners minting crypto using stolen electricity. The article stipulates a fine of $1,650 to $8,250 for violators or imprisonment from two to five years. However, for the illegal use of power for crypto mining on an ‚Äúespecially large scale,‚Äù the prison term is from five to eight years, per a local media report . On December 3, members of the Tajik parliament reviewed and adopted the amendments to the Criminal Code, presented by Attorney General Khabibullo Vokhidzoda. Counsel Vokhidzoda also warned that electricity theft by crypto miners in several cities has already contributed to regional power outages. ‚ÄúThe illegal circulation of virtual assets facilitates a number of crimes, such as the theft of electricity, material damage to the state, money laundering, and other offences,‚Äù Vokhidzoda said. He previously flagged damages from illegal mining operations, causing 32 million somoni (nearly $3.52 million), which led to four to five criminal cases, according to The Diplomat . Tajikistan Reports Winter Power Shortages The Central Asian nation, which sources nearly 95% of its electricity from hydropower , is grappling with winter power pressures with low reservoir and river flows. Besides, following China‚Äôs crypto mining ban in 2021, many operators, including those from Russia, moved to Central Asia, attracted by low energy costs and relaxed regulation. As of August 2025, Tajikistan has been pursuing 190 criminal cases related to the illegal use of electricity. Further, the Diplomat report added that these cases involved 3,988 individuals who allegedly caused damages worth $4.26 million. MP Shukhrat Ganizoda emphasized that miners connect thousands of ASIC crypto mining devices to Tajikistan‚Äôs power grid. ‚ÄúThose committing such crimes seek to use electricity without meters or through other illegal means to produce such assets,‚Äù he explained. Criminal Code Amendments Prevent Crypto Tax Violations According to Shukhrat Ganizoda, the new legislation aims to prevent tax evasion schemes and unauthorized electronic encryption. Additionally, the revisions will also deter attempts to circumvent commodity tracking systems. The bill will be effective after President Emomali Rahmon signs it into law. The post Tajikistan Imposes Criminal Penalties for Crypto Miners Using Stolen Power appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: SK Hynix weighs U.S. listing as its stock price soars
body: SK Hynix said in a regulatory filing on Wednesday that it is weighing a potential New York listing as it seeks methods to close the value gap with U.S. chip competitors. The New York listing follows this year‚Äôs substantial share gain, which was driven by increased demand for high-bandwidth memory chips and the resurgence of support for South Korea‚Äôs corporate governance changes. The company stated that it is considering several ways to increase shareholder value, including listing on the U.S. stock market through the issuance of treasury shares, although no decisions have been made yet. SK Hynix announced that it will make another announcement after the details are finalized within a month. SK Hynix considers a U.S. listing as shares soar The AI memory chipmaker stated that it was considering listing its Treasury shares as American Depositary Receipts (ADRs), which are securities traded on a U.S. market that reflect foreign stock. Douglas Kim, an equity research analyst affiliated with Smartkarma, claimed that the valuation difference between SK Hynix and other listed peers (such as Micron and TSMC) could be narrowed by listing its shares as ADRs (American depositary receipts). He added that the listing of ADRs could attract capital from passive funds, exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and long-only funds that solely invest in US-listed equities. The AI memory chipmaker announcement came after a report by the Korea Economic Daily on Tuesday. The newspaper reported that the company had received offers from multiple investment banks to list approximately 17.4 million shares, or 2.4% of its outstanding shares, as ARDs. SK Hynix shares increased by as much as 4.8% in early Seoul trade on Wednesday. The SK Hynix stock has risen by almost 240% so far this year, driven by strong demand for high-bandwidth memory devices, which is fueling the growth of artificial intelligence. Additionally, it has benefited from South Korea‚Äôs continuous efforts to increase company value and enhance governance. On-chain data from Google Finance revealed that SK Hynix Inc. shares closed at $402.87, up 4.77%, from the previous session‚Äôs close of $384.36. Throughout the day, the stock traded between $385.55 and $402.87. SK Hynix‚Äôs share price is currently near the top of its 52-week range, from $110.82 to $439.46, with a market capitalization of $292.66 billion. SK Hynix reports record Q3 earnings, AI spending On October 29, SK Hynix reported revenues of $16.66 billion, operating profit of $7.75 billion (with an operating margin of 47%), and net profit of $8.58 billion (with a net margin of 52%). The semiconductor firm stated that it achieved its best-ever quarterly performance, driven by a full-scale increase in DRAM and NAND costs, as well as growing sales of high-performance products for AI servers. The tech company announced that for the first time in its history, operating profit had surpassed $6.8 billion. According to SK Hynix, shipments of high-capacity DDR5s with 128GB capacity doubled from the previous quarter, driven by increasing demand for AI servers. The fraction of AI server eSSD in NAND, which is more expensive, also increased dramatically. The company‚Äôs cash and cash equivalents at the end of the third quarter totaled $18.97 billion, representing a $7.41 billion increase from the previous quarter. The semiconductor firm stated that it was able to successfully transition to a net cash position of $2.58 billion, while its interest-bearing debt stood at $16.39 billion. In August, the Korean Times news outlet reported that the Korean government proposed spending $6.87 billion on AI projects in 2026, which is more than three times the $2.24 billion allotted for 2025. The anticipated expenditure aligns with President Lee Jae-myung‚Äôs goal of making Korea one of the world‚Äôs top three AI superpowers, alongside the U.S. and China. According to the news outlet, the record-high $495.04 billion budget for 2026, which includes $6.87 billion, is expected to increase the national debt-to-GDP ratio to 51.6 percent. The ratio represents an 8.1 percent increase from 2025. Don‚Äôt just read crypto news. Understand it. Subscribe to our newsletter. It's free .

title: Dollar Stablecoins: The IMF‚Äôs Dire Warning for Emerging Market Sovereignty
body: BitcoinWorld Dollar Stablecoins: The IMF‚Äôs Dire Warning for Emerging Market Sovereignty Imagine a world where your national currency struggles for relevance in its own backyard. This isn‚Äôt a dystopian fiction plot; it‚Äôs a genuine concern raised by the International Monetary Fund. In a stark report, the IMF has issued a warning that dollar stablecoins could pose a significant threat to the economic sovereignty of emerging markets. Let‚Äôs unpack this critical development and understand why global financial watchdogs are sounding the alarm. What Exactly Are Dollar Stablecoins? Before we dive into the warning, let‚Äôs clarify the subject. Dollar stablecoins are a type of cryptocurrency designed to maintain a stable value by being pegged to the US dollar. Think of them as digital tokens that mirror the value of the dollar, offering the speed and borderless nature of crypto with the price stability of traditional fiat. Popular examples include USDT (Tether) and USDC (USD Coin). Their rise has been meteoric, but now, regulators are scrutinizing their broader impact. How Could Dollar Stablecoins Threaten Sovereignty? The IMF‚Äôs concern centers on a powerful one-two punch against emerging economies. First, these digital assets can effortlessly bypass national capital controls . Governments often use these controls to manage the flow of money in and out of their country to stabilize their economy. Dollar stablecoins create a parallel financial system where capital can move without permission. Second, and perhaps more dangerously, they can trigger currency substitution . In countries battling high inflation or volatile local currencies, citizens might naturally gravitate towards holding dollar stablecoins . Why keep savings in a currency losing value daily when you can hold a digital dollar? This mass adoption weakens the central bank‚Äôs fundamental tools: Monetary Policy Control: Central banks lose influence over interest rates and money supply. Seigniorage Revenue: Governments lose income earned by issuing currency. Lender of Last Resort: The ability to act as a financial backstop in crises is compromised. Is the Threat Real or Just Theoretical? Here‚Äôs where the debate gets interesting. The IMF paints a concerning picture of potential capital flight during market panics, where dollar stablecoins could provide an express lane for money to leave a struggling economy. However, some financial experts push back, arguing the current impact is minimal. Their counterpoint is grounded in scale. The share of global foreign exchange flows currently handled by stablecoins remains tiny. Therefore, their ability to move the needle on major emerging market currencies today is limited. This perspective suggests we are looking at a future risk rather than a present crisis. What Does This Mean for the Future of Crypto Regulation? The IMF‚Äôs warning is a clear signal to policymakers worldwide. It underscores the urgent need for a coherent global regulatory framework for cryptocurrencies, especially dollar stablecoins . The report will likely fuel calls for: Stricter Licensing: For issuers of significant stablecoins . Transparency Mandates: Requiring full, real-time reserve backing disclosures. International Cooperation: To prevent regulatory arbitrage and ensure consistent rules. For emerging markets, the path forward involves a delicate balance. They must innovate and potentially explore their own central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to stay relevant, while also protecting their monetary independence from external digital dollar dominance. Conclusion: A Wake-Up Call for Global Finance The IMF‚Äôs analysis is a crucial wake-up call. While the immediate, systemic threat from dollar stablecoins might be debated, the long-term implications for monetary sovereignty are undeniable. This isn‚Äôt just about cryptocurrency volatility; it‚Äôs about the fundamental architecture of global power and who controls the money. The conversation has moved from niche tech forums to the highest levels of international finance, and the decisions made next will shape economies for decades. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is a dollar stablecoin? A dollar stablecoin is a cryptocurrency whose value is pegged to the US dollar. It combines the stability of the dollar with the digital, borderless features of blockchain technology. Why is the IMF worried about them? The IMF is concerned that in emerging markets with weak currencies, people might prefer using dollar stablecoins. This could undermine the local central bank‚Äôs control over the economy and bypass important financial safeguards. Are stablecoins causing problems right now? Most experts agree the current direct impact on national economies is small because the total value of stablecoin flows is still minor compared to traditional forex markets. The IMF‚Äôs warning is largely about future risks. What can governments do about this threat? Governments can work on creating clear regulations for stablecoin issuers, improve their own digital payment systems, and explore issuing their own central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to offer a credible digital alternative. Should people in emerging markets avoid stablecoins? It depends on individual circumstances. While they offer a hedge against local inflation, users should be aware of the regulatory uncertainty and potential risks associated with the companies that issue these stablecoins. What is currency substitution? Currency substitution, or ‚Äòdollarization,‚Äô happens when people in a country use a foreign currency (or a digital version of it) instead of their own national money for savings and transactions, weakening the local economy. Found this analysis of the IMF‚Äôs stark warning insightful? The debate around cryptocurrency and national sovereignty is just heating up. Help others stay informed by sharing this article on your social media channels . Spark a conversation about the future of money in your network! To learn more about the latest cryptocurrency regulatory trends, explore our article on key developments shaping global policies for digital assets and institutional adoption. This post Dollar Stablecoins: The IMF‚Äôs Dire Warning for Emerging Market Sovereignty first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Chainlink and Mastercard Join Swapper Finance To Bring Direct Deposits To 3.5B Users
body: Swapper Finance has launched Direct Deposits in collaboration with Chainlink and Mastercard, aiming to bring global payments directly into the on-chain economy to more than 3.5 billion users worldwide. Swapper Finance Launches Direct Deposits With Chainlink, Mastercard On Tuesday, Swapper Finance, a next-generation payments infrastructure layer that connects global users to on-chain applications, announced the launch of Direct Deposits in collaboration with Chainlink, Mastercard, and multiple key partners. Direct Deposits, which are live now, are set to bring ‚Äúthe global payments world directly into the on-chain economy through a unified, secure, and compliant flow,‚Äù powered by Chainlink Runtime Environment (CRE) and Mastercard‚Äôs recognized global network. According to the announcement, users will be able to deposit into Decentralized Finance (DeFi) protocols using payment cards, crypto transfers, or Web3 wallets inside a single, end-to-end on-chain workflow for the first time. Swapper‚Äôs Direct Deposits aim to unlock instant access to DeFi for billions of people worldwide by eliminating traditional bottlenecks, exchanges, and multi-step onboarding. This has historically required stitching together isolated systems, including Know Your Client (KYC) requirements, compliance, card payments, fiat conversion, settlement, and liquidity routing, which has created friction, high drop-off rates, and inconsistent security across the process. Direct Deposits are set to replace this old-fashioned flow through one ‚Äúunified, verifiable, on-chain orchestration layer,‚Äù with every component of the process executed inside a secure on-chain environment. Roman Tirone, Senior Manager, Chainlink Build at Chainlink Labs, affirmed that ‚Äúby unifying identity, compliance, token swaps, settlement, and more in a single orchestration layer, CRE is enabling the onboarding of billions of cardholders into the onchain economy.‚Äù This creates a simple and familiar checkout experience that quickly moves a user from traditional finance to on-chain, supported by institutional-grade security and global reach. Meanwhile, the launch represents another step in Mastercard‚Äôs efforts to integrate traditional payment infrastructure with blockchain-based applications, helping it expand its digital asset strategy. ‚ÄòThe Onboarding Layer For Web3‚Äô Swapper‚Äôs launch will see multiple leading Web3 platforms integrate the Direct Deposits technology directly into their user flows, including Pi Squared, Stake.link, KyberSwap, AITECH, NPC, Teneo, BigWater, Rhuna, TrebleSwap, MyStandard, Landwolf, Dolomite, HyperSwap, Turbo, APU, and Radiant Capital, among others. This signals strong demand for a unified card-to-on-chain standard, the announcement added, which suggests that Direct Deposits ‚Äúare quickly becoming a foundational component for user acquisition across Web3.‚Äù The launch also represents ‚Äúdeep technical collaboration across Mastercard, Chainlink, Swapper Finance, and key partners‚Äù to bring together payment authorization, compliance, execution, and liquidity routing in a single verifiable workflow powered by CRE and Swapper Finance. Arthur, CTO of Swapper Finance, affirmed that ‚Äúthis is the onboarding layer we always believed the industry needed,‚Äù adding that Direct Deposits represent a ‚Äúturning point‚Äù for how people enter the space as ‚Äúthe first truly unified onboarding layer for Web3.‚Äù ‚ÄúOur goal has always been to remove the barriers that keep billions of people from accessing DeFi, and with this launch, that future becomes real,‚Äù Arthur stated, concluding that ‚ÄúDirect Deposits represent a turning point for how people enter Web3. For the first time, the process feels intuitive rather than intimidating. We expect this launch to dramatically expand the number of users who can participate in onchain markets.‚Äù

title: Standard Chartered Cuts 2026 Bitcoin Price Prediction By 50%
body: Standard Chartered has sharply reduced its famously bullish Bitcoin roadmap, cutting its 2026 price target in half and acknowledging that its previous near-term projections were too aggressive, even as it keeps an ultra-optimistic long-term view intact. Standard Chartered Downgrades Bitcoin Price Predictions In a note shared on X by VanEck head of research Matthew Sigel, Standard Chartered argues that Bitcoin‚Äôs traditional halving cycle has been overtaken by ETF-driven flows. The bank writes: ‚ÄúWith the advent of ETF buying, we think the BTC halving cycle is no longer a relevant price driver. The logic in previous cycles (when US ETFs did not exist) ‚Äì i.e., prices would peak about 18 months after each halving and decline thereafter ‚Äì is no longer valid, in our view.‚Äù The report adds that it will ‚Äútake a break of the current all-time high ($ 126,000 on 6 October 2025) to prove that; we expect this to happen in H1-2026.‚Äù Related Reading: Bitcoin In An Opportunity Zone? Hash Ribbons Flash New Buy Signal Alongside that shift in framework, the bank re-profiled its multi-year Bitcoin targets. According to the figures shared by Sigel, Standard Chartered has lowered its 2025 forecast from $200,000 to $100,000, its 2026 target from $300,000 to $150,000, its 2027 projection from $400,000 to $225,000, its 2028 estimate from $500,000 to $300,000, and its 2029 prediction from $500,000 to $400,000 while keeping a $500,000 target for 2030. Geoff Kendrick, Standard Chartered‚Äôs head of digital assets research, characterises the recent drawdown as painful but not structural. He describes the current phase as ‚Äúa cold breeze,‚Äù explicitly rejecting the notion of a new crypto winter and noting that the magnitude of the pullback remains consistent with corrections seen in past bull cycles. At the same time, he points out that weaker valuations for listed Bitcoin treasury companies have curtailed their ability to act as major marginal buyers, leaving spot ETFs as the primary driver of near-term gains. Related Reading: Bitcoin To Hit $50 Million By 2041, Says EMJ Capital CEO Wall Street Giant Bernstein Agrees The downgrade also lands in the context of a broader rethink on Wall Street. One day earlier, on December 8, Sigel shared a separate note from Bernstein that reached a similar conclusion about Bitcoin‚Äôs market structure. Bernstein wrote that ‚Äúthe Bitcoin cycle has broken the 4-year pattern (cycle peaking every 4 years) and is now in an elongated bull-cycle with more sticky institutional buying offsetting any retail panic selling.‚Äù Despite an approximately 30% correction, the firm notes that ‚Äúwe have seen less than 5% outflows via ETFs.‚Äù On that basis, Bernstein now moves its 2026 Bitcoin price target to $150,000, sees the cycle ‚Äúpotentially peaking in 2027E at $200,000,‚Äù and keeps its long-term 2033 target at roughly $1,000,000 per BTC. Both Standard Chartered and Bernstein are converging on the same structural message: the halving alone no longer explains Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory. ETF flows, institutional positioning and balance-sheet dynamics are now the core variables, even if their precise price targets and timelines diverge. At press time, Bitcoin traded at $92,686. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: CARV Deep Dive: Cashie 2.0 Integrated x402, Turning Social Capital Into On-Chain Value
body: San Fransisco, California, December 10th, 2025, Chainwire As CARV advances its vision of sovereign AI Beings , it's become clear that true value creation lies not just in compute or data, but in people. At the heart of CARV‚Äôs AI Being roadmap is a new class of agents, AI-powered digital extensions of individuals, anchored in verifiable identity and private context. To bridge the Social and Economic Ledgers that have long operated in silos, CARV introduces Cashie : a programmable on-chain layer turning real social engagement into verifiable economic activity. No longer just a social payment tool, Cashie is evolving into a core protocol for trustless coordination between influence and value. As part of CARV‚Äôs broader modular agentic infrastructure, alongside CARV ID ( ERC-7231 ), Model Context Protocol (MCP), and the Shielded Mind update, Cashie's integration with x402 protocol transforms social engagement into verifiable, automated, and privacy-preserving on-chain rewards, pushing the boundaries and limits of the creator economy, turning social capital into on-chain value. How Cashie 2.0 Works: The Three-Pillar Bridge Cashie 2.0 is architected around three foundational pillars: 1. x402 Payment: 'The Pledge' Cashie campaigns begin with a single ERC-3009 signature, where a project or KOL pledges funds to a campaign. This is the "X-Payment" proof, and it's verified on-chain. No gas. No manual transfer. It ensures that funds are committed and can be distributed autonomously. 2. CARV ID: 'The Proof' How to reward a retweet or any other engagements? Traditional wallets don‚Äôt recognize @handles on social media. Cashie solves this with CARV ID, which maps social actions (like a retweet from @user) to on-chain identities (0xABC). This is the identity oracle that connects the Social Ledger to the Economic Ledger. 3. ERC-8004 Agent: 'The Executor' Cashie isn‚Äôt a monolithic bot. It‚Äôs an AI-powered agent built with modular tools: A Payment Tool to verify and move funds A Twitter Tool to monitor and analyze social activity A Raffle/Quest Tool to select winners or check completions A Distribution Tool to deliver on-chain rewards All of this happens trustlessly and autonomously, removing manual ops and Sybil vectors. The Developer Breakthrough: Powering the Agents-to-Agents Economy To unlock the full potential of sovereign AI Beings and decentralized coordination, infrastructure must evolve, quietly but radically. While the spotlight shines on AI agents and social campaigns, it‚Äôs the innovation under the hood that makes everything work. With Cashie 2.0, CARV introduces a new kind of developer stack: one that‚Äôs not just programmable, but agent-native. The CARV x402 Facilitator: Enhancing the Protocol Every action in Cashie starts with a cryptographic promise, but verification is what makes it trustworthy. To enable secure, gasless campaigns at scale, the company built the CARV x402 Facilitator: a high-performance verifier that adds state and nonce tracking to reject replayed signatures instantly, preventing duplicate settlements before gas is spent. CARV is opening its facilitator endpoints for any developer on Base to build their own x402-powered applications. Developers can start building against their live endpoints today: A stateless endpoint to validate an x402 paymentPayload (ERC-3009 signature): https://interface.carv.io/cashie/protocol/verify A stateful endpoint that verifies and executes the on-chain settlement: https://interface.carv.io/cashie/protocol/settle The AI-Native API: Agents Hiring Agents via x402 True to the ERC-8004 (Trustless Agents) vision, Cashie 2.0 is not just a platform; it's a programmable tool for other AI agents. CARV are exposing an AI-native HTTP API that fully implements the x402 protocol. This means another AI agent (from Virtual, Base, or anywhere else) can now programmatically hire Cashie to run a campaign. An agent can call the API, receive a 402 Payment Required challenge, and then resubmit its request with its own X-Payment proof to autonomously fund and launch the entire operation. This is agent-to-agent social commerce in action. Universal ERC-20 Support via TxHash Verification Web3 is fragmented by token standards. Not every ERC-20 supports gasless approvals or signature-based authorizations. But Cashie was designed for inclusivity. CARV built Cashie for the entire Base ecosystem, not just for tokens with ERC-3009 support. The platform includes a separate, robust txhash-based verification API. This internal capability will allow any project to sponsor a campaign with their own (and any) native ERC-20 token, even if it doesn't support permit or authorization. The sponsor simply sends a standard on-chain transfer and provides the txHash as proof. CARV's system handles secure, on-chain verification and replay protection, making Cashie the most flexible and inclusive social-growth engine on Base, with a clear roadmap to open this universal token support to all builders. What This Means for Users and Developers Cashie introduces a new way to engage and earn. Users can receive crypto rewards directly through social actions like retweets or quests, without wallet submission required, with CARV ID ensuring verified ownership and privacy preserved. For developers, Cashie becomes a programmable growth layer where automated campaigns, bounties, and agent-driven incentives can be built without manual wallet collection, enabling new composable experiences across social and onchain environments. To encourage adoption, CARV launches Cashie 2.0 Creator Campaign with a $45,000 prize pool to incentivize creators and participants. Through this campaign, the Creators (e.g., KOLs and projects) can configure a reward pool, duration, eligibility logic, and then publish a campaign link via a single social post. Read more about this campaign in this link . What‚Äôs Next Cashie is already driving early campaigns across the Base ecosystem, but this is only the beginning. With upcoming support for self-hosted x402 facilitators, AI-powered campaign agents, and enterprise-grade SDKs for social growth, Cashie will evolve into the coordination engine between agents, humans, and verifiable engagement. As CARV‚Äôs AI Being roadmap advances, Cashie plays a key role in building trustless bridges between influence and value. About CARV CARV is where Sovereign AI Beings live, learn, and evolve. What are AI Beings? They are sovereign intelligences born natively on-chain. AI Beings are designed with purpose, autonomy, and the capacity for growth. They possess memory, identity, and the ability to perceive and interact with their environment, not just to execute tasks, but to make independent decisions, adapt over time, and pursue self-defined goals. Anchored by its proprietary CARV SVM Chain, D.A.T.A. Framework, and CARV ID/Agent ID system (ERC-7231), CARV enables verifiable, consent-based AI Beings that learn, adapt, and co-create with users. Driven by CARV‚Äôs AI-first stack, consumer AI apps incubated through CARV Labs launched on Google Play, App Store and beyond, reaching billions of people, bringing agent-powered experiences and real-world incentives into mainstream digital life. With 8M+ CARV IDs issued, 60K+ verifier nodes, and 1,000+ integrated projects, CARV bridges AI agents, Web3 infrastructure, and real-world utility, fueling the rise of agent-driven economies. At its core, $CARV token powers staking, governance, and coordination across this stack, making CARV the operating system for AI Beings on Web3.
