title: Top Crypto Investors Shocked as This New Altcoin Continues Its 250% Run, Only 5% Under $0.04 Left
body: Top crypto investors have become spellbound by a new altcoin that is moving at a rapid pace and its momentum does not seem to slow down. As it has already increased by 250% and a minor part of its allocation remains below the $0.04 mark, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is emerging as one of the most observed potential breakout contenders in the next four years. The continuous hype is putting the project on a narrow new frontier that many are thinking could close even earlier than they thought. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Mutuum Finance has created a decentralized system of lending that is made up of systematic borrowing and lending. The Peer to Contract market has two parties, the assets lent to it include ETH or USDT and lenders obtain mtTokens, which appreciate in value as the interest is returned by borrowers. The Peer to Peer market would allow the borrowers to access the lenders in a direct manner. The rate of borrowing is flexible. Rates remain lower when the liquidity is high. In case of tightening of liquidity, the cost of borrowing increases. The loan-to-value restraints control prudent usage of collateral. Liquidation can be done in case the collateral of a borrower depreciates a great deal. Discounted collateral is received and part of the debt is repaid by liquidators. These workings facilitate the protocol to run even when fast moving markets are involved. Growth and Increasing Demand in Presale Mutuum Finance was opened at the beginning of 2025 at $0.01. It currently is priced at $0.035 indicating a 2.5x increase in the course of development. It has been funded to more than $19.250M and the community has increased to 18,500 holders. It has sold 815M tokens on the project. Of the total amount of 4B MUTM tokens, 1.82B, or 45.5% is channeled towards presale phases. Phase 6 has now over 95% claim and it has 5% tokens remaining at the present price. Phase 7 would come with an almost 20% price rise and the listing price is pegged at $0.06 that would place Phase 1 buyers in a possible 500% upsurge upon commencing. The 24-hour leaderboard is another position of the project where the best contributor wins $500 MUTM every day. Card payment access has ensured ease of participation to new users thereby assisting in boosting demand in the last phase. V1 Testnet, Security Prep and Analyst Projections On the official X account, Mutuum Finance affirmed the V1 testnet will go live in the fourth quarter of 2025. The initial one includes the lending pool, the mtTokens, the liquidation engine and the debt module. Other currencies, such as ETH and USDT, will be launched. This is the initiation point of live borrowing and lending, and it is usually when a nascent DeFi project gains steam. The other reason why investors are keeping a watch on MUTM is security. The project had an audit of a CertiK with a 90/100 score on the Token Scan. Halborn Security is considering the lending agreements to analyze the rules of liquidation, behavior of collateral and logic of interest. There is an open bug bounty of 50K to identify the problems before V1 is released. When V1 switches on and the demand to borrow escalates, certain analysts looking at the mechanics of the protocol may go to a range between 5x and 8x. These premature predictors are fuelled by the developing yield of the mtTokens, buy-pressure and long-term growth. Stablecoin Implementation Mutuum Finance is going to roll out an interest-backed USD-pegged stablecoin according to the official Roadmap. The stablecoins contribute to the expansion of the lending markets due to providing predictable lending conditions and the increase of liquidity. The stablecoin with a great power tends to become the basis of more effective lending pools. The roadmap also includes layer-2 scaling. Introduction of L2 reduces costs and accelerates transactions. The lending systems are based on real time updates of collateral, interest and liquidation levels. Quick performance increases stability and user experience. In conjunction with the stablecoin growth, oracle reliability and L2 growth, certain long-run models suggest that Mutuum Finance could enter into a 10x to 12x region by 2027 given the adoption success. Phase 6 Almost Complete Phase 6 is almost fully sold. The future price increase and the rising popularity of the project also have contributed to hastening the demand. Whale entry of more than $100K in recent days further decreased the leftover supply. Participation of whales generally means an assurance of larger investors who anticipate tremendous improvements in the following milestone. Mutuum Finance has already established itself as among the potential next crypto to explode in the next quarter of 2026. Its developing utility, early pricing, solid investment, increasing participation and approaching V1 launch have put in place a situation that many investors are keeping close tabs on. For more information about Mutuum Finance (MUTM) visit the links below: Website: https://www.mutuum.com Linktree: https://linktr.ee/mutuumfinance

title: Google News Unleashes AI Summaries: Major Publishers Join Groundbreaking Pilot Program
body: BitcoinWorld Google News Unleashes AI Summaries: Major Publishers Join Groundbreaking Pilot Program In a transformative move that could reshape how we consume digital news, Google has launched a groundbreaking pilot program introducing AI-powered article overviews on select publications‚Äô Google News pages. This revolutionary development represents a significant shift in the relationship between technology giants and traditional news media, with major publishers including The Guardian, The Washington Post, and The Times of India participating in this commercial partnership. What Are Google News AI Summaries? Google‚Äôs new AI summaries represent a fundamental change in how news is presented to users. Instead of simply displaying headlines and snippets, the system generates comprehensive overviews that provide context before readers click through to full articles. This approach aims to give users more information upfront, potentially changing how people engage with news content. The AI-powered article overviews work by: Analyzing multiple articles on the same topic Generating concise summaries that cite participating sources Providing clear attribution to original publishers Including direct links to full articles Major News Publishers Embrace AI Technology The pilot program includes an impressive roster of international news organizations. Participants span multiple continents and languages, demonstrating Google‚Äôs global approach to this initiative. The participating news publishers include: Publisher Country Language The Guardian United Kingdom English The Washington Post United States English Der Spiegel Germany German El Pa√≠s Spain Spanish The Times of India India English Folha Brazil Portuguese Infobae Argentina Spanish Kompas Indonesia Indonesian The Washington Examiner United States English How the Gemini App Enhances News Discovery Google‚Äôs integration extends beyond traditional news platforms into the Gemini app, where the company is partnering with organizations including The Associated Press, Estad√£o, Antara, and Yonhap to incorporate real-time information. This expansion represents a multi-platform approach to AI-enhanced news delivery. Key features coming to the Gemini app include: Dedicated carousels for news subscriptions AI Overviews providing synthesized information AI Mode for enhanced search capabilities Increased inline links with contextual introductions The Financial Model: Direct Payments to Publishers One of the most significant aspects of this pilot program is Google‚Äôs commitment to providing direct payments to participating news publishers. This financial arrangement addresses a major concern in the industry: that AI summaries might reduce traffic to publisher websites, potentially impacting advertising revenue. The commercial partnership model includes: Direct compensation from Google to publishers Potential to offset traffic decreases Collaborative experimentation with new features Exclusive appearance on participating publications‚Äô pages Global Expansion of Preferred Sources Feature Alongside the AI summaries pilot, Google announced the global rollout of its ‚ÄúPreferred Sources‚Äù feature. Originally launched in the U.S. and India in August, this tool allows users to select their favorite news sites and blogs to appear in the Top Stories section of Google search results. The rollout schedule includes: Immediate availability for English-language users worldwide Expansion to all supported languages in early 2025 Integration with news subscription highlighting Potential concerns about ideological bubbles Audio Briefings: News for the Listening Generation Recognizing changing consumption habits, Google is experimenting with audio briefings as part of the pilot program. This feature caters to users who prefer listening to news rather than reading it, representing another dimension of Google‚Äôs multi-format approach to information delivery. Potential Impact and Industry Implications The introduction of AI overviews represents both opportunity and challenge for the news industry. While publishers gain financial compensation and potential audience engagement benefits, they also face the reality that users might consume summaries without visiting their websites. Key considerations include: Balancing convenience with publisher sustainability Maintaining journalistic integrity in AI-generated content Ensuring proper attribution and source visibility Addressing potential bias in algorithmic summarization Google‚Äôs Evolving Approach to News Distribution This pilot program follows Google‚Äôs July introduction of AI summaries in Discover, the main news feed inside Google‚Äôs search app. The company has been gradually expanding its AI capabilities in news delivery, suggesting a long-term strategy to integrate artificial intelligence throughout its information ecosystem. Google emphasizes that these developments are part of an ongoing evolution: ‚ÄúAs the way people consume information evolves, we‚Äôll continue to improve our products for people around the world and engage with feedback from stakeholders across the ecosystem.‚Äù FAQs About Google‚Äôs AI News Summaries Which publishers are participating in Google‚Äôs AI summaries pilot? The program includes The Guardian , The Washington Post , Der Spiegel , El Pa√≠s , The Times of India , and several other international publications. How does Google ensure proper attribution in AI summaries? The system includes clear publisher logos and citations, with direct links to full articles. Google states these features will include ‚Äúclear attribution and a link to articles.‚Äù What is the Gemini app‚Äôs role in this initiative? Google‚Äôs Gemini app will feature enhanced news capabilities including subscription carousels and AI Overviews, with partnerships including The Associated Press for real-time information. How are publishers compensated for participation? Participating news publishers receive direct payments from Google as part of the commercial partnership, which may help offset potential traffic decreases from AI summaries. When will Preferred Sources be available globally? The feature is now available for English-language users worldwide, with expansion to all supported languages planned for early 2025. Google‚Äôs AI-powered article overviews pilot represents a pivotal moment in the intersection of artificial intelligence and journalism. By partnering with major news publishers and introducing direct compensation models, Google is attempting to balance technological innovation with publisher sustainability. The success of this initiative will depend on how effectively it serves both users seeking convenient information and publishers needing sustainable revenue models. As AI continues to transform information consumption, this pilot program offers valuable insights into potential future directions for the entire news industry. To learn more about the latest AI and technology trends transforming media, explore our comprehensive coverage of key developments shaping artificial intelligence integration across various industries. This post Google News Unleashes AI Summaries: Major Publishers Join Groundbreaking Pilot Program first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: SHIB Is Dead Unless It Reclaims Key Support Zone, Warns Bitcoin Advisor
body: Shiba Inu‚Äôs future appears precarious unless the token regains a crucial support area, according to Bitcoin advisor Nebraskan Gooner. The warning comes as the broader crypto market eyes a potential rebound, with Bitcoin showing signs of strength. Gooner highlighted a key price range between $0.000014 and $0.00001 as essential for SHIB‚Äôs survival. Without reclaiming this zone, he suggests the token‚Äôs long-term outlook remains bleak. Crucial Support Zone Holds Historical Significance In a post on X, Gooner argued that Shiba Inu is ‚Äúeffectively dead‚Äù unless it climbs back into a horizontal band marked in red on his chart. This zone previously acted as multi-year support, where SHIB repeatedly consolidated and surged. The token notably recorded one of its strongest rallies after touching this area in early March 2024, climbing to $0.000045. Since then, SHIB has experienced a sharp decline, revisiting the support range between $0.000014 and $0.00001 earlier this year. Source: X Gooner emphasized that losing such a major support level often signals trend exhaustion or a deeper bearish phase. He noted that once a key support area breaks, it can flip into strong resistance, making upward recovery difficult. Consequently, he warned that failing to rebound into this critical zone could render SHIB ‚Äúdead,‚Äù as any rally may lack momentum. Currently, Shiba Inu trades at $0.000008551, around 33‚Äì38% below the $0.000013‚Äì$0.000014 support range. The token has dropped 5.27% in the past 24 hours. SHIB price chart, Source: CoinMarketCap Market commentators on Gooner‚Äôs post noted that SHIB‚Äôs situation mirrors a broader trend, with most altcoins appearing stalled during the current market phase. Some argued that recovery may remain limited until the next altcoin season begins. Recovery Hinges on Team Strategy and Bitcoin Movement Despite the bearish outlook, some community members believe SHIB could replicate its 2021 surge if the project‚Äôs team refocuses its efforts. Zach Humphries highlighted the need for Shiba Inu‚Äôs ecosystem initiatives to center around SHIB. He emphasized positioning the token to capture renewed retail interest and developing a clear, actionable roadmap to restore past momentum. Analysts also suggest that Bitcoin‚Äôs performance could influence SHIB‚Äôs trajectory. Captain Faibik recently predicted that Bitcoin might rebound from $90,000 to $125,000 later this week. Such a rally could provide the broader crypto market, including SHIB, with the momentum needed to recover lost ground. However, Gooner maintains that without regaining the $0.000014‚Äì$0.00001 support zone, Shiba Inu‚Äôs long-term prospects remain uncertain. Source: X

title: XRP Price Prediction: $100M Whale Dump Hits Just Before Breakout ‚Äì Can Retail Buying Stop the Bleed?
body: XRP whales have dumped a significant volume of tokens ahead of today‚Äôs FOMC meeting and may have delayed the token‚Äôs recovery. However, long-term holders are still not selling and continue to show the kind of commitment that favors a bullish XRP price prediction . According to data from Santiment, whale wallets holding between 100 million and 1 billion XRP have sold nearly $600 million worth of tokens since December 5. Meanwhile, since December 7, whales dumped over $100 million, showing that deep-pocketed investors are still selling even though the price has recovered. This explains why XRP has struggled to move past the $2 mark. The token has accumulated a 5% in the past 7 days as the Federal Reserve prepares to make a decision on interest rates today. Meanwhile, trading volumes have jumped by 60% in the past 24 hours, reaching nearly $4 billion. This accounts for 3% of the token‚Äôs circulating market cap and reflects a spike in trading activity ahead of the Fed‚Äôs interest rate decision. XRP Price Prediction: XRP Could Fully Recover If It Breaks This Key Resistance XRP needs to clear the $2.20 level to reverse its downtrend. The FOMC meeting could provide the necessary catalyst for this to happen, as traders will be reassured about what the future holds once Powell speaks. Such a bullish breakout would also push XRP above its 200-day exponential moving average (EMA). The Relative Strength Index (RSI) needs to rise past the mid-line and above the 14-day moving average as well. This is typically interpreted as confirmation that bullish momentum is accelerating. If XRP breaks through its current resistance, the $3 level could be the first major target, backed by strong psychological significance and historical price action. As broader sentiment improves, high-upside crypto presales like Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) could rally even harder. With nearly $30 million raised in its ongoing presale, the project is bringing Solana‚Äôs technology to the Bitcoin blockchain. Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) Supercharges BTC with Solana Speed ‚Äì Early Investors Are Piling In Bitcoin‚Äôs biggest strength is security, but its biggest weakness is speed. That‚Äôs where Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) comes in. This new Layer 2 solution uses Solana‚Äôs cutting-edge technology to fix Bitcoin‚Äôs biggest limitations, unlocking fast transactions, low fees, and full support for DeFi, meme coins, NFTs, and more. The project is built around the Hyper Bridge, which lets BTC holders safely move funds onto the Hyper L2. Once transferred, users instantly receive a 1:1 amount on the L2 network with near-instant finality. This opens the door to a fast-growing ecosystem where BTC users can finally access staking, payments, and high-yield opportunities. Bitcoin Hyper has already raised nearly $30 million from early investors who believe this will be the breakthrough that finally brings smart contracts to Bitcoin at scale. As more top wallets and platforms integrate with Hyper L2, demand for its native token, $HYPER, is expected to surge. To join the presale, visit the official Bitcoin Hyper website and connect a supported wallet like Best Wallet . You can buy $HYPER using crypto or a bank card at the current price of $0.013375, before the next price rise in less than 32 hours. title: SEI lands major Xiaomi deal to bring on-chain finance to global smartphone buyers
body: SEI Network plans to boost its access with more global users after a partnership with Xiaomi. The phone producer will pre-install a SEI wallet with access to decentralized finance for users outside Mainland China. SEI Network will become the default chain for new Xiaomi wallets after a partnership with one of the largest phone producers. SEI Network announced the partnership, which aims to give more users direct access to on-chain finance. SEI will focus on stablecoin payments through its specialized finance app. A new era of mobile finance is coming to Xiaomi's global user base. A next-gen finance app powered by Sei and designed for stablecoin payments, will be integrated into the Xiaomi mobile ecosystem, coming pre-installed on new devices. Money made instant ‚Äî built into your phone. pic.twitter.com/75ly01AHB3 ‚Äî Sei (@SeiNetwork) December 10, 2025 SEI will become a part of Xiaomi‚Äôs expansion with 168M new devices each year. ‚Äò This collaboration with Xiaomi represents a watershed moment for blockchain adoption, ‚Äô said Jeff Feng, Co-Founder of Sei Labs. ‚Äò By embedding Sei‚Äôs high-performance infrastructure directly into one of the world‚Äôs most popular smartphone ecosystems, we‚Äôre not just solving the onboarding problem‚Äîwe‚Äôre reimagining how billions of users will interact with digital assets in their daily lives, ‚Äô said Feng. The chain joins Solana and its proprietary phone in combining device access with a specific blockchain, as well as the earlier Samsung decision to carry a native wallet. SEI network aims to make a comeback The SEI network is an L1 chain, independent of other ecosystems. The network carries $89M in native and bridged stablecoins, and around $215M in decentralized liquidity. Following the announcement, SEI tokens appreciated to a seven-day high, up by around 2.2% for the day to $0.14. SEI attempted to make a comeback this year, but its native token trades near all-time lows, still awaiting a breakout. After the latest price recovery, SEI‚Äôs open interest increased to $59M. SEI Network attracted more than $81M in netflows for the past three months. The chain has a relatively diverse source of bridging and liquidity, including both L1s like BNB Chain and L2s like Polygon and Arbitrum. The chain retains a small ecosystem of apps, including lending and DEX. SEI launches Global Mobile Innovation Program SEI will invest $5M in a Global Mobile Innovation Program to increase real-world blockchain adoption through consumer devices. As part of the program, the SEI crypto wallet and discovery app will be installed on all new Xiaomi phones outside of Mainland China, and excluding the USA. The collaboration aims to enable stablecoin payments within the Xiaomi mobile ecosystem, including more than 20,000 retail stores. Users will be able to log in using Google credentials or Xiaomi ID. The app will grant access to top decentralized applications and platforms, as well as support for P2P transfers and consumer-to-business payments. SEI and Xiaomi will roll out the new app in regions with proven crypto adoption, focusing on Europe, Latin America, Southeast Asia, and Africa, potentially reaching millions of clients. The app may become the first access point for users into crypto, especially for countries where Xiaomi dominates the market. Get $50 free to trade crypto when you sign up to Bybit now

title: Revolutionary AI Model for Crypto Research: Surf Secures $15M to Transform Digital Asset Analysis
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary AI Model for Crypto Research: Surf Secures $15M to Transform Digital Asset Analysis Imagine having an artificial intelligence assistant that can analyze thousands of cryptocurrency projects simultaneously, identify market trends before they emerge, and provide institutional-grade research in seconds. This vision just moved closer to reality as Surf, an innovative AI research platform, secured $15 million in funding to build a specialized AI model for crypto research. The investment signals growing confidence in artificial intelligence‚Äôs potential to transform how we understand and navigate the complex world of digital assets. What Makes This AI Model for Crypto Research Different? Surf isn‚Äôt just another data analytics tool. The platform represents a fundamental shift in how cryptocurrency research is conducted. Traditional analysis methods often struggle with the sheer volume and complexity of blockchain data, but Surf‚Äôs specialized AI model for crypto research is designed specifically to handle these challenges. By focusing exclusively on digital assets, the platform can develop deeper insights than general-purpose AI systems. The funding round was led by Pantera Capital, one of the most respected names in cryptocurrency investing, with significant participation from Coinbase Ventures and Digital Currency Group. This backing from industry leaders demonstrates strong confidence in Surf‚Äôs approach to building an AI model for crypto research. These investors recognize that better research tools are essential as the cryptocurrency market matures and becomes more complex. How Will Surf 2.0 Transform Cryptocurrency Analysis? The $15 million investment will primarily fund the development of Surf 2.0, an enhanced version of the platform‚Äôs AI model for crypto research. This upgrade promises several key improvements that could change how both retail and institutional investors approach digital assets. The new system will process more data sources, provide more accurate predictions, and offer more intuitive interfaces for users at all experience levels. Surf plans to expand its enterprise services significantly. This means that while individual traders will benefit from improved tools, the most substantial impact might be on institutional adoption. Consider these potential applications: Risk assessment for cryptocurrency portfolios Due diligence on new blockchain projects Market sentiment analysis across multiple platforms Regulatory compliance monitoring for changing requirements Automated research reports on specific tokens or sectors Why Is Specialized AI Crucial for Crypto Research? The cryptocurrency market presents unique challenges that require specialized solutions. Unlike traditional financial markets, crypto operates 24/7 across global exchanges with varying standards and transparency levels. An effective AI model for crypto research must understand blockchain technology fundamentals, token economics, decentralized governance, and the social dynamics of crypto communities. Surf‚Äôs approach addresses these complexities by training its AI specifically on cryptocurrency data patterns. This specialization allows the system to recognize signals that general AI might miss, such as smart contract vulnerabilities, whale wallet movements, or emerging DeFi trends. The platform‚Äôs success could accelerate institutional adoption by providing the research infrastructure that traditional finance expects. What Challenges Does This AI Model for Crypto Research Face? Despite the promising technology and substantial funding, building an effective AI model for crypto research involves significant challenges. Cryptocurrency markets are notoriously volatile and influenced by factors that are difficult to quantify, such as social media sentiment, regulatory announcements, and technological breakthroughs. The AI must navigate these complexities while avoiding common pitfalls like overfitting to historical patterns that may not repeat. Moreover, the competitive landscape is intensifying. Several companies are developing similar tools, and established financial data providers are adding cryptocurrency coverage to their existing platforms. Surf‚Äôs advantage lies in its specialized focus and early backing from industry leaders, but maintaining this edge will require continuous innovation and adaptation to market changes. The Future Impact on Crypto Investors and Institutions As Surf develops its enhanced AI model for crypto research, both individual and institutional investors stand to benefit significantly. For retail traders, better research tools could level the playing field against well-funded institutions. For enterprises, Surf‚Äôs platform could reduce research costs while improving decision quality. The long-term impact might extend beyond investment decisions to influence how blockchain projects are designed and evaluated. The successful development of Surf 2.0 could trigger a broader trend toward specialized AI tools in cryptocurrency. As these tools become more sophisticated, they may help address some of the industry‚Äôs persistent challenges, including information asymmetry, market manipulation detection, and investment due diligence. Ultimately, better research infrastructure supports healthier market development and broader adoption. Surf‚Äôs $15 million funding represents more than just another startup investment‚Äîit signals growing recognition that cryptocurrency research requires specialized tools built for this unique asset class. The development of an advanced AI model for crypto research could transform how we analyze digital assets, making sophisticated research accessible to more investors while providing institutions with the tools they need to participate confidently in this emerging market. Frequently Asked Questions What exactly is Surf‚Äôs AI model for crypto research? Surf‚Äôs AI model is a specialized artificial intelligence system designed specifically to analyze cryptocurrency markets and blockchain projects. Unlike general AI tools, it‚Äôs trained exclusively on digital asset data to provide more accurate and relevant insights for crypto investors and researchers. Who invested in Surf‚Äôs $15 million funding round? The funding round was led by Pantera Capital, with participation from Coinbase Ventures and Digital Currency Group (DCG). These are established leaders in the cryptocurrency investment space, indicating strong industry confidence in Surf‚Äôs approach. What will Surf do with the $15 million investment? The primary use of funds is developing Surf 2.0, an enhanced version of their AI platform, and expanding enterprise services. This includes improving the AI model‚Äôs capabilities, adding more data sources, and making the platform more accessible to institutional clients. How will Surf‚Äôs AI model benefit individual cryptocurrency investors? Individual investors will gain access to research tools that were previously available only to institutions. The AI can process vast amounts of data quickly, identify trends, assess risks, and provide insights that would take humans much longer to compile manually. When will Surf 2.0 be available to users? While Surf hasn‚Äôt announced a specific launch date, the substantial funding suggests accelerated development. Typically, such platform upgrades become available in phases, with early access for enterprise clients followed by broader release. How does Surf‚Äôs AI differ from other crypto analysis tools? Surf focuses specifically on AI-driven research rather than just data aggregation. Their system is designed to understand context, recognize patterns unique to cryptocurrency markets, and provide actionable insights rather than just raw data. title: Stunning Bitcoin Price Prediction: Ric Edelman Forecasts $180K by 2026
body: BitcoinWorld Stunning Bitcoin Price Prediction: Ric Edelman Forecasts $180K by 2026 Could Bitcoin truly be headed for a staggering $180,000 within the next few years? Esteemed investor and founder of the Digital Assets Council of Financial Professionals, Ric Edelman, has placed a bold bet on this very outcome. His latest Bitcoin price prediction is sending ripples through the crypto community, offering a detailed rationale for why the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency could more than triple its current value by 2026. Let‚Äôs unpack his compelling analysis. What is the Basis for This $180K Bitcoin Price Prediction? Ric Edelman‚Äôs forecast isn‚Äôt just a random number. He provides a clear market narrative to support his Bitcoin price prediction . According to his analysis shared with DL News, the 2024 bull run faced significant headwinds. Edelman points to two primary factors that curbed the rally: early whales taking profits and a wave of large-scale forced liquidations. However, he sees this not as a bearish signal, but as a necessary market cleanse. His core argument is simple yet powerful. As this selling pressure exhausts itself and excessive market leverage disappears, the stage is set for a major rebound. This forms the foundation of his optimistic Bitcoin price prediction . He anticipates a robust recovery phase where organic demand can finally drive prices upward without the overhang of mass sell-offs. How Does the Path to $180,000 Unfold? Edelman‚Äôs timeline provides a concrete roadmap. He forecasts a substantial price surge for both Bitcoin and Ethereum in the coming year. Specifically, he predicts a 50% to 100% rise for both assets in 2025. This intermediate step is crucial for reaching his ultimate Bitcoin price prediction of $180,000 by 2026. Let‚Äôs break down the math and implications: For Bitcoin: A 50-100% rise from current levels sets the stage for the final push to $180,000. For Ethereum: A parallel rise would position ETH around $6,600, according to his model. Market Mechanics: The disappearance of leverage means fewer cascading liquidations, creating a more stable foundation for growth. This phased approach suggests Edelman believes in a sustained, multi-year bull cycle rather than a short-lived spike. His Bitcoin price prediction relies on fundamental market resetting, not just speculative hype. What Challenges Could Derail This Bitcoin Price Prediction? While Edelman‚Äôs outlook is bullish, savvy investors must consider potential obstacles. No Bitcoin price prediction is guaranteed, and the crypto market is notoriously volatile. Key challenges include: Regulatory shifts from governments worldwide Unforeseen macroeconomic crises impacting risk assets Technological issues or security concerns within the Bitcoin network A slower-than-expected exhaustion of the current selling pressure However, Edelman‚Äôs analysis implies that the largest systemic overhang‚Äîexcessive leverage and whale distribution‚Äîis already being addressed by the market. This forms a compelling part of his Bitcoin price prediction thesis. Actionable Insights from This Forecast What should an investor do with this Bitcoin price prediction ? First, understand that it‚Äôs a forecast, not financial advice. However, Edelman‚Äôs status as a respected financial professional lends weight to his analysis. Consider these steps: Conduct your own research (DYOR) beyond any single prediction. Review your portfolio allocation to crypto assets. Dollar-cost average to mitigate timing risk if you believe in the long-term thesis. Monitor market leverage metrics to see if Edelman‚Äôs premise about disappearing leverage holds true. Remember, the journey to any lofty Bitcoin price prediction is rarely a straight line. Volatility will remain a constant companion. Conclusion: A Vision of Crypto‚Äôs Future Ric Edelman‚Äôs $180,000 Bitcoin price prediction for 2026 paints a vivid picture of crypto‚Äôs potential next chapter. It‚Äôs a forecast built on the idea of market renewal‚Äîwhere current pressures subside, making way for a powerful new advance. Whether this exact number materializes, the underlying analysis highlights critical market dynamics every investor should watch. The convergence of exhausted sellers, reduced leverage, and sustained institutional interest could indeed create a fertile environment for significant growth, making this a Bitcoin price prediction worth serious consideration. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Who is Ric Edelman? Ric Edelman is a noted financial advisor, author, and the founder of the Digital Assets Council of Financial Professionals (DACFP), an organization dedicated to educating financial professionals about blockchain and digital assets. What was Edelman‚Äôs main reason for the 2024 rally stalling? He attributed the curbed rally to two factors: early large holders (whales) taking profits and a series of large-scale forced liquidations that created sustained selling pressure. Does Edelman‚Äôs prediction include Ethereum? Yes. His model forecasts a 50-100% rise for both BTC and ETH in 2025, which would put Ethereum around $6,600 as part of the same market recovery thesis. Is a $180K Bitcoin price prediction realistic? While ambitious, it is within the realm of historical Bitcoin volatility and previous bull market multiples. Its realism depends heavily on the broader adoption cycle, regulatory environment, and macroeconomic conditions playing out favorably. What does ‚Äòmarket leverage disappearing‚Äô mean? It refers to a reduction in traders using borrowed funds (leverage) to amplify their bets. High leverage increases volatility and forced selling. Its reduction can lead to a more stable and organic price discovery process. Should I invest based solely on this prediction? No. Treat any price prediction, including this one, as a perspective to inform your research, not as direct investment advice. Always make decisions based on your own financial situation, risk tolerance, and due diligence. Share This Insight Did you find this deep dive into Ric Edelman‚Äôs bold Bitcoin price prediction valuable? If so, help others in the crypto community stay informed. Share this article on your social media channels to spark discussion and analysis among fellow investors. What‚Äôs your take on the path to $180K? To learn more about the latest Bitcoin price prediction trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin‚Äôs future price action and institutional adoption. title: Strategy blasts MSCI plan to drop crypto treasuries from indexes
body: Strategy has planted a flag against MSCI‚Äôs proposal to remove digital asset treasury companies (DATs) from its Global Investable Market Indexes. According to the company, the wiser course for MSCI, for investors, and for the broader economy is for MSCI to remain neutral and let the markets decide the course of DATs. According to Cryptopolitan , MSCI argued that crypto treasury companies are more like investment funds than operating companies. However, Strategy led by Executive Chairman Michael Saylor argued that it builds Bitcoin-backed credit instruments, manages an active corporate treasury program, and maintains a global enterprise analytics software business, not a passive vehicle for tracking price movements. Investors buy the company‚Äôs strategy and management, not a static wrapper for Bitcoin. ‚ÄúStrategy is not an investment fund, and it does not passively hold Bitcoin. Strategy is an operating business that actively uses the Bitcoin it holds to create returns for shareholders,‚Äù the company wrote. Strategy says the proposal is discriminatory, arbitrary, and has zero positive effect The company warned that implementing the proposal‚Äôs 50% threshold is discriminatory, arbitrary, and has zero positive effect. It singles out digital asset businesses while leaving untouched companies in other industries with similarly concentrated holdings in oil, timber, gold, media and entertainment, and real estate. Additionally, Strategy stated that such a move would disrupt market stability. The leading corporate holder of Bitcoin is urging MSCI to consider DATs as operating entities that contribute to economic progress and innovation. Strategy also claimed that the proposal is believed to conflict with US policy. President Trump signed an executive order to promote the growth of digital financial technology. The administration also established a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and promoted the inclusion of digital assets in 401(k) plans. The company also requested that MSCI provide further consultation. ‚ÄúMSCI should allow time for the digital asset industry and DATs to evolve and gain their footing before proposing broad-stroke rules and criteria. At a minimum, MSCI should not take such a consequential step without engaging in further consultation,‚Äù the letter read. Besides Strategy, Strive, a structured-finance company listed on Nasdaq, is fighting MSCI‚Äôs proposal to exclude Bitcoin-heavy companies from major global equity benchmarks. As reported by Cryptopolitan, the firm that holds over 7,500 Bitcoins sent a letter this week to Henry Fernandez, MSCI‚Äôs CEO, stating that the proposed exclusion would violate the ‚Äúlong-established principle of index neutrality.‚Äù According to analysts, Strategy could see up to $2.8 billion of its stock liquidated under MSCI‚Äôs proposal. The company was added to MSCI‚Äôs indices in May 2024 and has been included for approximately a year and a half. Strategy adds over $1 billion worth of Bitcoin in two months Strategy has continued its aggressive accumulation approach through November and December 2025. In November, the company added a total of approximately 9,062 BTC across several transactions, including a major purchase of 8,178 BTC for $835.6 million at an average price of $102,171 per coin. The company added 130 BTC for $11.7 million early this month, reaching a symbolic 650,000 BTC milestone, valued at roughly $58.5 billion at the time. The pace accelerated slightly later in the month with a blockbuster purchase of 10,624 BTC for $962.7 million between December 1 and 7 at $90,615 per coin. This brought the total holdings to 660,624 BTC, acquired for approximately $49.35 billion at an average cost of $74,696 per BTC. In a recent statement, CEO Phong Le said that Bitcoin sales are possible in extreme situations, such as a 95% price drop that would trigger margin calls. This goes against Saylor‚Äôs long-held ‚Äúnever sell‚Äù mantra and has led to speculation about an unimaginable fire sale of their 3% share of the total Bitcoin supply. The company‚Äôs mNAV is hovering near 1.0, and shares have dropped 50% since October. Get seen where it counts. Advertise in Cryptopolitan Research and reach crypto‚Äôs sharpest investors and builders.

title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: US Bank Now Lets Clients Buy BTC Directly ‚Äì Could This Be the Start of a Banking Domino Effect?
body: PNC Bank, the sixth-largest commercial bank in the United States, has launched direct spot Bitcoin trading for eligible private bank clients, becoming the first major U.S. bank to offer native Bitcoin exposure. Crypto analysts say the domino effect of this direct custody could positively impact the trajectory of the Bitcoin price prediction . U.S Banks Break Down Barriers to Bitcoin Access The new PNC bank service enables qualified private banking clients to purchase, hold, and sell Bitcoin without relying on external cryptocurrency exchanges. Today marks a major milestone for institutional crypto adoption. @Coinbase ‚Äôs Crypto-as-a-Service platform is now powering @PNCBank ‚Äôs launch of direct bitcoin trading for PNC Private Bank clients ‚Äì the first to market with such an offering among the major U.S. banks. pic.twitter.com/wwuOIRuBfK ‚Äî Coinbase Institutional (@CoinbaseInsto) December 9, 2025 This development follows a crucial regulatory milestone from the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency, which recently confirmed that national banks may conduct riskless principal crypto-asset transactions. The decision permits U.S. banks to function as intermediaries in crypto trades by simultaneously buying from one customer and selling to another without maintaining inventory. Last week, Bank of America authorized its 15,000 wealth management advisers to recommend 1%‚Äì4% crypto allocations for client portfolios, signaling a broader institutional embrace of mainstream Bitcoin exposure. In October, Citibank announced plans to launch crypto custody services in 2026, after developing the infrastructure over two to three years. Meanwhile, Cryptonews reported in September that BNY Mellon is advancing toward offering custody services for Bitcoin and Ethereum, specifically targeting exchange-traded product clients. If other major banks replicate PNC‚Äôs approach, BTC could establish stronger support levels in the coming months and position itself for a further push toward the $100,000‚Äì$130,000 range heading into 2026. Bitcoin Price Prediction: Breakout Targets $105K, $110K, $120K Bitcoin is attempting to escape a multi-week descending channel after defending critical support near $83,000. The recent bounce pushed the price back above the 9-day simple moving average, demonstrating early momentum, though it remains near the channel‚Äôs upper boundary. The RSI has climbed out of oversold territory and is now approaching the mid-50s, indicating recovering bullish momentum following a prolonged downtrend. Source: TradingView If Bitcoin closes decisively above the descending channel and maintains support above $90,000‚Äì$92,000 , charts suggest upside continuation toward resistance clusters at $105,000, $110,000, and potentially $120,000. However, failure to sustain this breakout zone risks a retest of $83,000 support. This New Meme Coin Raised $4.3M Fast ‚Äì Is It the Next Dogecoin? Inspired by Dogecoin‚Äôs explosive 1,000x rally, $MAXI is building a high-energy community where traders share alpha , early setups , and hidden gems before they go mainstream. Since launching only a few months ago, the presale has already pulled in over $4.3 million , with strong momentum. This could be one of the cycle‚Äôs most relatable, community-first opportunities, and early backers still have time to get in before the next price increase kicks in. title: Stellar‚Äôs December Outlook Brightens as Network Use Cases Grow, but Major Resistance Still Looms
body: Surging about 4% in the past 24 hours, Stellar (XLM) goes through December with a mix of optimism and caution as new payment integrations and institutional pilots draw attention back to the network‚Äôs utility. Related Reading: The Current Bitcoin Price Pump Will End In A Crash ‚Äì Here‚Äôs When To Start Selling However, despite signs of growing real-world use, XLM continues to trade near a critical long-term support level, leaving traders divided on whether the token is preparing for a recovery or facing another downward leg. Recent activity across payments, banking pilots, and data-infrastructure upgrades show how Stellar‚Äôs ecosystem is expanding at a time when the token sits at a pivotal market position. The tension between strengthening fundamentals and fragile price structure is shaping the month‚Äôs outlook. XLM's price trends to the downside on the daily chart. Source: XLMUSD on Tradingview Rising Utility Gives Stellar a Boost Network usage has climbed following several developments in November. Wirex activated USDC and EURC card-settlement on Stellar for more than seven million users, shifting everyday transactions onto the blockchain and increasing stablecoin throughput. Days later, U.S. Bank began testing a programmable stablecoin on Stellar, adding an institutional layer to the network‚Äôs growing settlement activity. The recent integration of Space and Time (SxT), which now indexes the full Stellar network and provides cryptographically verified data to institutions, also strengthens the chain‚Äôs infrastructure. Together, these upgrades position Stellar as a functioning payments network rather than a speculative asset alone. Early market reaction has been modest, but analysts note that expanding stablecoin flows could support stronger demand for XLM over time. Price Holds Key Support as Traders Watch $0.245 Despite the momentum in utility, XLM continues to sit at one of its most important technical zones. The token has trended downward since November 2024 and now trades just above the $0.245 horizontal support, an area that has repeatedly prevented deeper losses over the past year. Weekly indicators remain bearish, with RSI below 50 and MACD negative, suggesting that long-term momentum still leans downward. Short-term charts show a contained bounce within an ascending channel, which analysts view as corrective rather than a new uptrend. A decisive break below $0.245 could open the door to new lows, while holding this level would give bulls another chance to challenge overhead resistance. Resistance Blocks Cap Upside Expectations Even with potential catalysts from network growth, analysts remain cautious about XLM‚Äôs ability to retest previous highs. Multiple reports highlight the $0.26‚Äì$0.27 range as the first major resistance zone, followed by a broader cluster near $0.28‚Äì$0.31. Some forecasts suggest a possible move toward $0.31 by year-end if momentum strengthens, though this outlook carries medium confidence given the broader market‚Äôs uncertainty. Related Reading: NFT Slump Worsens With Monthly Sales Hitting Rock Bottom Stellar‚Äôs December narrative is supported by two opposing forces, rising real-world adoption and a price chart still struggling against long-standing resistance. Whether utility gains translate into market recovery will depend on XLM‚Äôs ability to hold its support level and reclaim key technical thresholds in the weeks ahead. Cover image from ChatGPT, XLMUSD chart from Tradingview

title: Ethereum Founder Buterin Slams Elon Musk As Anti-Europe Attacks Ignite
body: Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin has issued a sharp public warning to Elon Musk over how X is being used to direct increasingly aggressive rhetoric at Europe, arguing that the platform is drifting from a free-speech ideal toward orchestrated hostility. Ethereum Founder Calls Out Elon Musk In a series of posts on X, Buterin said that ‚Äúthe attacks on Europe I‚Äôve seen here the last couple of days, including from people I‚Äôve generally considered interesting and sophisticated, have been getting unhinged.‚Äù He acknowledged that the European Union has serious shortcomings, listing ‚ÄúGDPR clickthroughs are dumb, Chat Control is awful, they need to be less bureaucratic and supportive toward entrepreneurs,‚Äù and criticizing what he called Europe‚Äôs selective moral stance, noting that its ‚Äúkindness toward Ukraine often doesn‚Äôt extend well to Gaza or Sudan or other places.‚Äù He also described ‚Äúpeople saying mean things about criminals getting longer sentences than the criminals‚Äù as ‚Äújust crazy.‚Äù Despite that, the Ethereum founder argued that the way some users on X are talking about Europe has moved well beyond legitimate criticism. He described ‚Äúthe apocalyptic attitude about the issues, evoking imagery of barbarians pillaging Rome etc,‚Äù as ‚Äúreally over the top‚Äù and said it ‚Äúfeels more like a coordinated attempt to delegitimize than constructive criticism.‚Äù He rejected the idea that the real target is only Brussels-based institutions, writing: ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt believe the line that ‚Äòthe target is not Europe, it‚Äôs the EU‚Äô: I‚Äôve seen many instances of London specifically being targeted in the hate session, so no, much of it is an attack on Europe.‚Äù This, he argued, does not match his experience from ‚Äúspending an average of two months every year there for the last decade.‚Äù The central confrontation came in a direct reply to Musk. Addressing the X owner‚Äôs self-positioning as a defender of free speech , the Ethereum founder wrote: ‚ÄúI think you should consider that making X a global totem pole for Free Speech, and then turning it into a death star laser for coordinated hate sessions, is actually harmful for the cause of free speech. I‚Äôm seriously worried that huge backlashes against values I hold dear are coming in a few years‚Äô time.‚Äù Buterin Hints At Russian Involvement The thread sparked pushback from some users who argued that his framing underplays European complicity in current conflicts. One critic responded that ‚Äú‚Äônot extending kindness‚Äô is an incredible way to frame funding, arming and politically backing a genocide,‚Äù and claimed that it is ‚Äúhilarious to think the US doesn‚Äôt suffer from many of the same things or worse that Americans say about the EU.‚Äù The Ethereum founder replied that Europe is ‚Äúa genuinely mixed bag,‚Äù emphasizing that ‚Äúdifferent countries in Europe have very different policies,‚Äù and pointing out that the continent ‚Äúalso hosts ICC, which is under a lot of pressure (see: judges being financially deplatformed).‚Äù Other replies widened the lens to geopolitics. Commenting on a suggestion that the current discourse looks like ‚Äúa coordinated campaign due to the Kremlin liking the new US ‚Äògoing back to Monroe‚Äô global security policy,‚Äù Buterin answered ‚Äúyeah basically‚Äù and added that ‚Äúa lot of powerful people really like the vision that the world should just be 5‚Äì20 adults who have their spheres and sometimes get together in a room to hash out any differences, and everyone else can be shut out because they are annoying and inconvenient.‚Äù At the same time, Buterin restated his support for the European project as an institutional experiment. ‚ÄúI have a lot of respect for the idea of EU, as an experiment in trying to get the benefits of a superstate, without the homogenization, becoming an aggressive ‚Äògreat power‚Äô, and other downsides,‚Äù he wrote, while stressing that ‚Äúthe experiment does need to be adjusted in a lot of ways; eg. we see not enough unity in its external policy and too much unity on top-down bureaucracy and surveillance at the same time.‚Äù If improved, he argued, ‚Äúit‚Äôs a model that could set a really good example for the world.‚Äù On the technical side, the Ethereum founder used the debate over ‚Äúgdpr clickthroughs‚Äù to propose a different approach to online control, calling for ‚Äúmore sophisticated user-side software (browsers, local LLMs‚Ä¶) that helps the user navigate the internet and make intelligent decisions about what requires confirmations from the user.‚Äù In contrast to the centralized dynamics he criticizes on X, he is effectively pointing back to user-empowering, decentralized tools as the way to reconcile regulation, usability and free expression. Musk Vs. The European Union Notably, Musk‚Äôs anti-EU outburst comes after the Commission has issued a fine of ‚Ç¨120 million to X for breaching its transparency obligations under the Digital Services Act (DSA). Musk wrote via X that ‚ÄúThe ‚ÄòEU‚Äô imposed this crazy fine not just on @X, but also on me personally, which is even more insane!‚Äù and says it would be ‚Äúappropriate to apply our response not just to the EU, but also to the individuals who took this action against me.‚Äù In subsequent posts he escalated further, declaring that ‚ÄúThe EU should be abolished and sovereignty returned to individual countries,‚Äù calling to ‚ÄúDissolve the EU and return power to the people,‚Äù and even asserting that ‚ÄúThe EU commissars are responsible for the murder of Europe.‚Äù At press time, Ethereum traded at $3,316.

title: Bitcoin miners face deep losses as hash price hits record low
body: The Bitcoin mining industry is getting squeezed hard as the crypto downturn drags miners into unprofitability, based on information gathered from Bloomberg. Companies across the sector are cutting back on hardware to slow the cash burn. The hash price just dropped to its lowest level ever, which shows how little miners now earn per unit of computing power. TheMinerMag reports that the median cost to mine (including equipment, energy, and debt) now sits above that revenue level, leaving many public miners operating at a loss. Mining firms are slowing down machines to reduce power usage after the latest drop in income. ‚ÄúAs hash price falls, we have seen almost a 8% drop in network hashrate, this is a result of miners using firmware to underclock their machines to save power,‚Äù said Ethan Vera, the chief operating officer at Luxor Technology. Ethan said the downturn is forcing operators to stretch out every kilowatt as they continue trading used rigs to stay afloat. Miners move revenue into AI infrastructure The main pressure point is the April 2024 halving, which cuts the reward miners earn from the network. That event hits every four years and reduces the Bitcoin output they receive for validating blocks, which instantly reshapes business math. Many miners now rely on hybrid setups involving AI and high-performance computing, a shift that lifted their stocks earlier this year even as core mining revenue shrank. Companies that now operate AI data centers pulled in billions of dollars to expand those facilities, but Bitcoin still brings in most of their income. Core Scientific collected about 21% of third-quarter revenue from high-performance compute services, while Terawulf brought in 14% from the same line. IREN Ltd., which saw its stock climb more than fourfold this year, generated around 3% of its revenue from high-performance computing, based on TheMinerMag‚Äôs estimates. TheMinerMag also reported that break-even prices for 14 tracked miners climbed by roughly 20% from a mean of $90,000 per Bitcoin in the third quarter. With Bitcoin averaging $104,000 so far in the fourth quarter, down from $114,000 the prior quarter, and trading around $92,000 on Wednesday, most miners fall short of profit. ‚ÄúInvestors that are piling in or had piled in to these companies over the most recent months are mainly concerned about the AI business, with very little interest in their Bitcoin mining operations,‚Äù said Mike Colonnese, managing director of equity research at HC Wainwright & Co. Mike said miners are preparing to unplug machines and replace them with AI data centers over the coming years. Companies pull back as non-US miners ramp capacity Public miners are also separating their stock performance from movements in Bitcoin, as more facilities once dedicated to mining switch to AI support. Core Scientific, Terawulf, IREN, and Cipher Mining have long-term contracts with companies like Google and Microsoft to host AI demand that could bring in billions of dollars. ‚ÄúThere has been a fundamental shift in Bitcoin mining as many major players exit the sector,‚Äù said Wolfie Zhao, analyst at TheMinerMag. Wolfie pointed out that Bitfarms Ltd. announced plans last month to wind down mining operations over the next few years to build new AI centers instead. Other miners that once chased aggressive expansion have paused announcements about growth plans. Wolfie said private companies outside the U.S. now account for more of the global hashrate, as U.S.-listed operators lose ground. ‚ÄúIt is the companies with smaller balance sheets and a lot of debt that will struggle the most,‚Äù Ethan said. ‚ÄúIt is going to be a pretty grim Q4 for a lot of miners, and it is even worse if you include their GPU businesses, which haven‚Äôt made any revenue yet.‚Äù The mining boom of early 2021 pushed the sector into a multibillion-dollar industry as companies bought specialized machines, built large data centers, and secured huge amounts of power across the country. Today, some of those same sites are being reused for AI, while others require brand-new construction. More than 95% of all Bitcoin that will ever exist have already been mined. Once the final coin arrives sometime around 2140, miners will rely entirely on transaction fees. ‚ÄúThere is only a finite amount of Bitcoin to be mined,‚Äù Wolfie said. ‚ÄúUnless Bitcoin prices go to the moon, AI demand seems to be a better bet since that is a much bigger pie to begin with.‚Äù Want your project in front of crypto‚Äôs top minds? Feature it in our next industry report, where data meets impact.

title: Ripple CEO on CNN: Ripple Uses XRP to Speed Up Money Transfers
body: In a recent CNN interview, Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse laid out a bold vision for the future of global payments. He said, ‚ÄúXRP is like a Bitcoin. It‚Äôs a digital asset. It‚Äôs today the third most valuable digital asset. And what we do is we take a transaction between banks.‚Äù His remarks have reignited discussion across the crypto and financial world about XRP becoming a foundational instrument for cross-border settlement. Lord XRP, via a post on X, shared key quotes and insights from Garlinghouse‚Äôs interview ‚Äî highlighting how XRP‚Äôs speed, liquidity, and technical design offer banks and payment providers a real alternative to legacy correspondent banking. From Correspondent Banking to Real-Time Liquidity Garlinghouse explained the inefficiencies of traditional banking: ‚ÄúInstead of having a bank pre-fund an account at the other bank, which is how correspondent banking works today, the Bank of Brad in dollars would pre-fund the Bank of Julia, perhaps in pounds, and then I would debit and credit that. But that means I have to pre-fund and have dormant capital sitting at that other bank.‚Äù Ripple‚Äôs solution allows financial institutions to tap directly into XRP liquidity , removing the need for pre-funding. Payments settle instantly, reducing costs and improving efficiency. LISTENING TO BRAD GARLINGHOUSE ON CNN!! #RIPPLE IS ONE STEP AWAY FROM BECOMING A WORLD BANK! #XRP IS F***** CHEAP IN MY OPINION pic.twitter.com/iggrgcue7F ‚Äî Lord XRP (@Bitforcoinz) December 10, 2025 Under RippleNet‚Äôs On-Demand Liquidity (ODL), a sending bank converts local currency into XRP, transfers it over the XRPL, and the receiving bank converts it back into the destination currency. The result: live cross-border settlement in seconds instead of days. Massive Adoption: Institutions, Corridors, and Volume As of 2025, RippleNet counts more than 300 banks and financial institutions across six continents.¬†Garlinghouse highlighted real-world use cases: ‚ÄúThe consumer itself doesn‚Äôt actually see that it‚Äôs flowing through XRP to solve a problem, but the consumer sees simply a better product at a better price.‚Äù Major financial players such as Santander (Europe), SBI Holdings (Asia), and Standard Chartered (Middle East & global markets) use Ripple infrastructure. About 40‚ÄØ% of RippleNet partners actively use XRP for ODL-based settlements, with total processed value exceeding US$1.3‚ÄØtrillion in the first half of 2025. Speed, Cost, and Technical Superiority Garlinghouse emphasized XRP‚Äôs technical advantage: ‚ÄúEven compared to Bitcoin, which takes up to 12 minutes to complete one transaction, XRP is extremely fast at about three seconds per transaction . That has meant XRP is extremely scalable in contrast to how Bitcoin works.‚Äù We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Fees remain negligible . Average XRP transaction fees are roughly US$0.0002, dramatically lower than traditional cross-border transfers. These features make XRP ideal for micropayments, remittances, and high-volume transfers. Ripple‚Äôs Strategic Momentum and Growth Trajectory Garlinghouse shared Ripple‚Äôs ambition: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre seeing more momentum than we‚Äôve ever had around using XRP to move this liquidity around the world. We couldn‚Äôt really be happier about how that has played out in a world where there‚Äôs still a lot of uncertainty and doubt about what‚Äôs going on in crypto. This is a real use case solving a real problem for real customers.‚Äù Ripple‚Äôs global footprint continues to grow. Partnerships with banks, launch of RLUSD, and acquisitions of corporate-crypto service firms signal strategic expansion. Within five years, Garlinghouse projects XRP could handle 14‚ÄØ% of cross-border payments volume currently dominated by SWIFT. Real-World Challenges and Adoption Nuances Despite growth, adoption remains uneven. Some banks use RippleNet for messaging only, without XRP as a bridge currency. Regulatory and risk management concerns may slow broader adoption. Still, data show clear upward trends. Increased corridor launches, rising on-chain volume, and growing institutional usage suggest XRP‚Äôs integration into banking is accelerating. In sum, Garlinghouse‚Äôs CNN statements highlight XRP‚Äôs transformation from a speculative token to a global liquidity bridge. Fast, low-cost, and scalable, XRP‚Äôs role in international banking may be closer than most expect. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. body: BitcoinWorld From Monzo to Revolut, Neobanks Lag on Stablecoin Rails as Digitap ($TAP) Emerges Best Crypto to Buy 2026 Neobanks have reshaped retail banking in the last decade. And this will only accelerate as Gen Z and Millennials become the more dominant demographics. But while neobanks have improved the UX, they still run almost entirely on legacy rails. At the same time, stablecoins have started to eat into global payments, and the total supply has climbed into the hundreds of billions of dollars. These digital dollars move 24/7, across borders, and settle in seconds instead of days. And that‚Äôs how crypto neobanks like Digitap plan to leapfrog existing neobanks. All the convenience, but now users can move money much faster and send it anywhere they want. How Digitap Built an Omni-Bank Digitap‚Äôs core proposition is simple: one account, all forms of value. The omni-bank supports more than 20 fiat currencies alongside over 100 crypto assets across multiple chains. All accessible through a neobank-style app downloadable on iOS and Android today. Another great feature is the Visa card program, and crypto natives can now spend their on-chain balances with millions of merchants. Users can swap between fiat and crypto instantly on the app, and as more value comes on-chain, the value of apps that allow seamless swaps between two systems naturally grows. Digitap‚Äôs design perfectly tracks how Gen Z and Millennials already manage their finances, and its combination of UX and better rails is putting this project on the list of best cryptos to buy now because it is anchored in real-world usage. $TAP is already beginning to look like the standout crypto presale for stablecoin and neobank exposure heading into 2026. $TAP‚Äôs Value Capture Tokenomics: The Best Crypto Presale for 2026? The biggest difference between Digitap and traditional neobanks is how value is captured. Monzo and Revolut route value to private shareholders and, eventually, public equity investors. Digitap routes value to its token holders. The platform has committed 50% of profits to purchasing $TAP on the open market. 50% will be burnt forever, and the other half will go to users who stake $TAP, unlocking passive income for long-term believers. This means that as the platform grows, the $TAP token will experience greater structural buy pressure. Digitap clearly believes the days of governance-only tokens are over and is delivering a token more like an equity that pays a dividend. The presale price of $0.0361 looks very undervalued, and the fact that Digitap has raised more than $2.3 million amid bearish market conditions speaks volumes. This crypto presale effectively offers discounted entry to a revenue-sharing layer of a live global money app that could grow as large as Monzo and Revolut in the coming years. Why Digitap Leads the Crypto Neobank Race Neobanks have done an excellent job upgrading finance. But a decade after Revolut‚Äôs launch, the next wave of growth is likely to come from projects such as Digitap, which marry the neobank UX with stablecoin rails. Digitap has enjoyed early presale success because its omni-banking product feels familiar to Monzo or Revolut customers, but offers much higher throughput and enhanced privacy. It targets a massive market for remittances and cross-border flows, and the $TAP token allows investors to become partial owners of this growth story. Banking tokens are emerging as the most interesting altcoins to buy this year. Digitap‚Äôs omni-bank and revenue-sharing design make this crypto presale a fascinating opportunity at the current price, and with the banking bull run about to begin, $TAP could be the standout crypto to buy now before 2026 begins. title: 1,350,000,000 XRP Pulled From Exchanges: What Are Ripple Whales Up To?
body: Over the last two months, the supply of XRP in exchanges has recorded a 1.35 billion decrease in terms of total tokens held. This shift is raising questions on what the big players, commonly referred to as whales, are up to behind the scenes. 45% Decline in Exchange Balances According to on-chain data shared by ChartNerd, XRP‚Äôs total exchange balance dropped from 3.95 billion to 2.6 billion tokens. This marks a 45% reduction over a period of fewer than 60 days. $XRP ‚Äòs total balance on exchanges has fallen off a cliff dropping from 3.95 billion tokens to roughly 2.6 billion marking a 45% collapse in just under 60 days ‚Äî1.35 billion #XRP removed from public order books pic.twitter.com/flh3UXCQAp ‚Äî ChartNerd (@ChartNerdTA) December 9, 2025 Such a shift could mean that tokens are being moved into cold wallets. When coins leave exchanges, they are less likely to be sold in the short term. As CryptoPotato reported , over 510 million XRP moved between large wallets in a single week, raising questions around distribution or storage changes. Meanwhile, XRP Ledger velocity has risen , showing that tokens are changing wallets more often. While the exchange balance dropped, XRP‚Äôs price also moved lower. It is trading at $2.08 as of press time, down more than 42% from the July 2025 high of $3.65. In the last week, the price has fallen by 5%. The trading volume in the past 24 hours reached 3.6 billion, an upsurge of 38% compared to the weekly average (per CoinGecko data). Although activity levels went up, the price could not sustain above $2.10 after briefly surging to $2.17, showing that sellers may be active near that level. Technical Pattern Points to 16% Move XRP is trading inside a symmetrical triangle pattern on the 4-hour chart, according to analyst Ali Martinez. These patterns often lead to breakouts once price pressure builds near the tip of the triangle. ‚Äú$XRP is trading inside a triangle and setting up for a 16% move,‚Äù Martinez posted. XRP Price Chart 10.12. Source: Ali Martinez/X A move above the upper trendline could push the price toward $2.4 to $2.45. A drop below support may send the price to the $1.8‚Äì$1.85 zone. Martinez also flagged $1.94 as the level XRP needs to hold to bounce higher. Long-Term Structure Targets $22 Peak Analyst CW shared a chart showing XRP in a four-phase market cycle. This cycle includes a base, a sideways range, a tightening pattern, and a breakout move. The current setup mirrors a pattern seen in 2017. Notably, the chart places the next possible price target at $22. This level is based on a Fibonacci extension of 6.618 from the prior move. On the weekly chart, the Stochastic RSI is rising from oversold levels. In past cycles, this indicator turned upward ahead of strong price increases. The post 1,350,000,000 XRP Pulled From Exchanges: What Are Ripple Whales Up To? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Velo Protocol Surges Forward with Major Partnerships and Proven Fundamentals
body: BitcoinWorld Velo Protocol Surges Forward with Major Partnerships and Proven Fundamentals Velo Protocol continues to build unstoppable momentum in Web3+ finance, stacking high impact partnerships that expand programmable payments, RWA tokenization, and borderless liquidity across Asia and beyond. From tokenized real-world assets to institutional-grade listings and super-app rollouts, every new milestone reinforces Velo‚Äôs position as one of the fastest executing infrastructures in the PayFi and RWA sectors, all while remaining sharply undervalued relative to its growing adoption and utility. Key recent milestones include: Strategic collaboration with EVOLVE Chain (Avalanche) to tokenize electric vehicles and green energy assets, bringing fractional ownership and sustainable finance to millions. Joint venture with Lightnet and OpenEden to launch Treasury-as-a-Service (TaaS) and the ASEAN Settlement Network, delivering yield-bearing tokenized U.S. Treasuries (TBILL) and instant regional settlements. Codevelopment of the Orbit Plus Super App with EVOLVE and Lightnet, now in beta, offering multi-chain wallets, RWA trading, loyalty rewards, and PayFi tools in a single seamless interface. Spot listing on OKX Singapore and perpetual futures on KuCoin, dramatically increasing institutional liquidity and regulated market access. Successful RWA debut of NASDAQ listed UCAR‚Äôs battery swap technology via PicWe Launchpad, proving Velo‚Äôs ability to onboard traditional enterprises into Web3. These wins complement existing integrations with Visa, Binance, Solana, and government-backed pilots in Southeast Asia, pushing the ecosystem past 1 million active users and billions in processed volume. At its core, Velo‚Äôs latest litepaper showcases rock solid fundamentals: Federated credit exchange network on Stellar Consensus Protocol issuing 1:1 fiat pegged digital credits Full-stack RWA tokenization engine for treasuries, receivables, and real world collateral High-throughput programmable payments with automated smart-contract settlements Compliance first KYC/KYB layer fused with on-chain privacy Hermes Warp cross chain bridge and Orbit loyalty system turning everyday transactions into yield opportunities In a market where comparable PayFi and RWA projects trade at 3‚Äì5√ó higher multiples, Velo‚Äôs combination of live products, institutional partnerships, and real traction stands out as one of the most compelling opportunities in blockchain finance today. A Velo Labs spokesperson commented: ‚ÄúEvery partnership and product launch brings us closer to a world where money moves at the speed of thought. The fundamentals are in place, the network is growing, and the best is clearly still ahead.‚Äù About Velo Labs Velo Labs is a global pioneer in Web3-based financial solutions, offering a cutting-edge liquidity and settlement network for secure, efficient value transfers. Backed by the Stellar Network and CP Group, our reach has expanded beyond Southeast Asia and the Pacific, now serving partners worldwide. We connect and complement the gap between traditional banking infrastructure and Web3, leading the way in blockchain mass adoption. Our extensive Web3-based payment network, along with Lightnet, our licensed settlement partner, position us as a global heavyweight. Velo Labs offers a diverse range of Web3-based products, notably Orbit, tailored for individuals, merchants, corporations, and enterprises worldwide‚Äîdedicated to empowering global financial connectivity and expanding accessibility globally. title: Superstate Launches SEC‚ÄëApproved Tokenized Share Issuance on Ethereum and Solana
body: Superstate introduced a new pathway that brings public equity issuance onto blockchain networks through a regulated structure. The firm now enables SEC-registered companies to sell new tokenized shares directly to investors on Ethereum and Solana. The move signals a shift toward faster capital formation as firms search for more efficient fundraising channels. Moreover, the development arrives as U.S. regulators accelerate experiments that merge traditional finance with blockchain infrastructure. Consequently, the launch positions Superstate at the center of efforts to modernize how public companies raise money and maintain shareholder records. Direct Issuance Targets Faster Funding and Instant Settlement The Direct Issuance Program lets issuers receive capital in stablecoins while investors receive tokenized shares in real time. This structure allows companies to manage shareholder updates instantly through Superstate‚Äôs regulated transfer agent system. Additionally, the program supports existing share classes or new digital-only classes, giving companies more flexibility in how they engage investors. Superstate expects the first offerings to launch in 2026. The firm argues that companies need issuance rails that match global capital flows and deliver immediate settlement. Hence, the appeal of stablecoin-based transactions grows as markets demand more certainty and speed. The approach may also help smaller issuers reach investors who prefer blockchain-based assets with transparent lifecycle tracking. Regulators Accelerate Blockchain Experiments Regulators under the Trump administration encourage more crypto-financial innovation, which strengthens interest in tokenized securities. Both the SEC and CFTC now advance guidelines that reduce uncertainty around digital issuance. Moreover, large issuers and fintech firms continue to test onchain models that integrate with compliance tools and custodial systems. Earlier efforts by Galaxy and Sharplink involved tokenizing existing shares for onchain holding. However, those initiatives did not raise new capital. Superstate now extends that foundation by enabling primary issuance that interacts directly with blockchain liquidity. Programmable Securities Unlock New Use Cases Tokenized shares issued through the program can include programmable features that update governance or distribution rules automatically. Besides, the digital structure allows integrations with onchain settlement, portfolio management, and institutional custody providers. These features may attract investors seeking assets that combine regulatory protection with efficient blockchain execution. Superstate intends to open its offering to both retail and institutional buyers after KYC checks. Consequently, the initiative may reshape how issuers approach capital formation and how investors access regulated digital securities.
